projectDesc.p: The Göttingen Register of Electronic Texts in Indian Languages (GRETIL) is a resource platform providing standardized machine-readable texts in Indian languages that have been contributed by various individuals and institutions.

correction.p: Apparent errors have been silently corrected.

normalization.p: GRETIL normalizes all texts contributed consistently for each language. Sanskrit texts are normalized in accordance with the scheme of the International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration (IAST) in order to facilitate word search across its corpus without additional transformations.

All characters that were fully equivalent to an IAST-conformant character in the text file contributed have been made to conform to the character list below. Non-conformant characters with additional information including accents, capitalization, and whitespace have been preserved as orig elements inside choice elements with their IAST-conformant equivalent in reg elements for the creation of a plain text. These additional informations will be available only in those transformations of this file that display the original information.

puṇyāmbhobhir akhaṇḍamaṇḍalaśaśijyotsnāvalīnirmalaiḥ /

lg.l: yatraiko 'py akṛtadhiyo manaḥpradoṣaḥ saṃsāraṃ vyasanaśatais tanoti kṛtsnam /
tatraikaḥ katham api cetasaḥ prasādo nocchindyād vyasanasahasratantujālam //
yaṃ gatvā śaraṇam ahaṃ jagatpradīpaṃ sarvāsaccaritavirodhinīṃ prapannaḥ /
āryāṇāṃ nayapadavīṃ samantabhadrāṃ taṃ vande kṛpaṇajanādhikānukampam //
ity uktvā vyasanaparāṅmukhaḥ sa rājā saṃbuddhe bhagavati niścalaprasādaḥ /
taṃ bhikṣuṃ kṣititalalagnamaulimūrdhnā vanditvā svapuravaronmukho jagāma //

body.p:
saṃbuddhe pratilabdhavān narapatiḥ śraddhām asau tādṛśīṃ
yat karmāvaraṇādrijālam akarod alpāvaśeṣāśrayam /

lg.l: pāpaṃ yat kriyate jine vrajati tat tair āryakāryaiḥ kṣayam
ekenaiva hi śakyate vilikhituṃ vajrasvabhāvo hy ayam //

body.p:
apy eva krakacair niśātadaśanacchedāvalīdanturais
tasyājñā pravicāryamānatanubhiḥ kāryaiva śāstur bhavet /

svābhiprāyam ato bravīmi sakalaṃ saṃsāram apy utsahe
vastuṃ bhīmabhayānake 'pi narake loke jinālaṃkṛte /

lg.l: na tv evaikam api kṣaṇaṃ surapure saṃbuddhaśūnye jagaty
tad yāvan na patati sarva eva loko durdṛṣṭimatavitate pramādakūpe /
sarvajñapravacanabhāskare gate 'staṃ tat tāvad vacanarasāyanaṃ niṣevyam //
sarvajñe paramagurau niveśya bhaktiṃ śrotavyaṃ vacanam ṛṣeḥ samantaśobhi /
nikṣipya vyasanamayīṃ kukāryacintāṃ nāto 'nyat param adhikaṃ yato 'sti kṛtyam //

body.p: Bhavalubdhaka = GoBhl
based on the edition by Ratna Handurukande. Five Buddhist Legends in the Campū Style - From a collection named Avadānasārasamuccaya. Bonn 1984 (Indica et Tibetica, 4).
2. Bhavalubdhaka
tadyathānuśrūyate /

dvau bhikṣū srotāpannau babhūvatus tābhyām ekenāśeṣasaṃyojanopakṣayād arhattvam adhigatam / taddvitīyas tanmātrasaṃtuṣṭa evāsīt / sa tenārhatocyate sma / bhadramukha śeṣakleśaviṣopaśamāya yatnam ārabhasveti / duḥkhaikarasā bhavā duṣṭapāpasiddhyupāyāni śreyāṃsi kṣaṇalavapariṇāmāviśvasanīyaṃ jīvitam apariniṣpannaprakṛtayo māyopamās tattvavirodhinaḥ kāmāḥ sabhayāḥ savairāḥ sopāyāsāḥ pāpakriyām evāṅgīkṛtya pravṛttāḥ paribhavāyatanam akṛtabuddhīnāṃ kṛtātmanām apy avahāsyatām āvahanti / leśenāpy anugamyamānā mahad duḥkham ākarṣanti / naitān anupatan kaś cid akṣato 'nupahato vā / hrīmanto 'py ebhir āviṣṭāḥ paśusahadharmatāṃ pratipadyante / naite tulayanti vayasāṃ pariṇāmavaikṛtam / yatijanam apy ete pragalbhā vyāmohayanty eva / śreyaso vadhakāḥ pratyamitrāś cāmī vyatītya vinayaniyamaśrībharām āryamaryādām anāryakam evodbhāvayanti / samuditakāntiśobham api kṣaṇena malinayanti puruṣasya śīlasauṣṭhavam / vipātite ca śīle sarvaviṣayāya dvārabhūte hatopaniṣatsamādhir nālaṃ prajñāsaṃpade / sakala eva ca saṃsāra eṣāṃ durantarāyāṇāṃ paryeṣaṇābhir atītaḥ / ye ca śvasūkarādīnām api sādhāraṇā ratiprasaṅgadohadāḥ kas tān sādhujano manasāpi prārthayet / sa tam arhantam abravīt / bhadramukha

lg.l: nānāvipattigahaneṣv anayaprapāteṣv andhān ivāśu pithite pathi saṃnipātya /
āryān api pratibhayena pathā harantaḥ prakhyāpayanty aśucayo viṣayāḥ svaśaktim //

body.p: atha so 'rhan mandasaṃvegāpanno 'yam āyuṣmān iti viditvā tam āha /

lg.l: abhinandaty anādeyān kṣaṇikān api yo bhavān //
caranti mattā iva bhagnalocanā ghanāndhakāre viparītabuddhayaḥ //
latāṃ dvirephā iva puṣpahāsinīm upāsate ye tu satāṃ sarasvatīm /
akāryanirmokam apāsya te kaler mukhaṃ na paśyanti punar vibhīṣaṇam //

body.p: sa tam arhantam abravīt / niruttarāṇy amūni vo vacanakusumāni / kiṃ tu
atha sa mahātmā tena tasya vacasā sutarām upajanitasaṃvego 'bravīt /

lg.l: na varṇayanti kṣaṇikām apīśvarā bhavābhinirvṛttim avandhyavādinaḥ /
tathā hy ayaṃ skandhakadambakodbhavaḥ samudbhavo naikavidhasya pāpmanaḥ //
punarbhavāsvādalavākulāśayaḥ pravṛttim anvicchati yas tu mohanāt /
mudhā sa sarvāyatanopatāpinīṃ vipattim anvicchati sarvatomukhīm //
bhavāḥ saśokāḥ sabhayāḥ savigrahā vivarjitāḥ sadbhir udāramānasaiḥ /
bhavāvaśiṣṭāḥ kila sapta jātayo bhayaṃ na te yena punarbhavāśrayam /
kṛtaṃ tvayāpāyikaduḥkhalaṅghanaṃ pravṛttim anvicchasi yena janmanaḥ /
jijīviṣus tīvraviṣābhidūṣitaṃ praṇītam apy annam upādadīta kaḥ //

body.p: api ca he bhavābhinandin

lg.l: narasya mātur jaṭharāntarāle kiṃ garbhavāso na mahān apāyaḥ //
prajāyamānasya narasya duḥkham apāyaduḥkhair api kiṃ na tulyam //
kathaṃ cid āyāsanipītaharṣo na kiṃ samo 'pāyaśatair manuṣyaḥ //

body.p:
pratyāvṛttasitākṣikośavikṛtavyāghrānano bhīṣaṇaḥ
śastreṇeva vidāryamāṇakaraṇo marmacchidā vāyunā /

lg.l: kruddheneva vitīryate 'dhikataraṃ kiṃ nāma duḥkhaṃ tataḥ //

body.p: kiṃ cāyuṣman

lg.l: naivāvīcir api vyathām upaharaty āryasya tāṃ dāruṇaḥ /
yāṃ kurvanti manojvarāḥ paricayāḥ sphītāvalepā malāḥ //

body.p: atha sa viṣayadaurātmyam ivodbhāvayaṃs taṃ maharṣim abravīt /
sa cārhaṃs tais tadvacobhiḥ sutarām udvejitapratibhayas taṃ śaikṣam avocat /

lg.l: na cānuvartanīyās te viṣayair ye parājitāḥ //
anyaiś ca vratibhir vīrais tat kasmān nānuvartase //
viṣayeṣu yadi pramādam eṣe tvam anāryācariteṣu hanta naṣṭam /
atha te virajanti naiva cetas tava ko 'rtho vada tair anarthabhūtaiḥ //
chalitaḥ puruṣaḥ prasaṅgadoṣair na ca saṃvetti nirāmiṣaṃ ratīnām //
paribhūya manasvino ramante kṛpaṇāṃ kāmaratiṃ tapovaneṣu //
gaticakracaravrataṃ narāṇāṃ viṣayā eva samādiśanty anāryāḥ //
udayā na tu sarvadā bhavanti prakṛtisvāsthyakṛtāṃ tathāgatānām //
tad ayaṃ samayaḥ kathaṃ cid eva pratilabdhaḥ kuśalaprayogayogyaḥ /
pratipattividhau bhavān pramāṇaṃ śakunānāṃ hi vanaṃ virāvamātram //

body.p: sa tam arhantam abravīt /

lg.l: śaknuyāṃ sugatau bhogaspṛhāṃ yady apy upekṣitum /
brūyāḥ pravadatāṃ śreṣṭha naiva māṃ tvaṃ punaḥ punaḥ //
yatas tu māṃ haraty eṣā kāmatṛṣṇā niśācarī /

body.p: sa taṃ mahātmā punar api sānukrośapeśalair vacobhiḥ saṃvejayann abravīt /

lg.l: khinnā vayaṃ rudhirabindum upādadānāḥ sāṃkleśikeṣu sabhayeṣu bhaveṣu vatsa /
āyāsinīṃ ca kaṭasīm abhivardhayanto naikāntarāyavivaśāḥ svaparābhavāya //
krūraiḥ parasparavirodhibhir apraśāntair dhātūragaiḥ prakupitair iva kṛṣṇasarpaiḥ /
ātudyamānavapuṣām aparāyaṇānāṃ kalpāyutāny abhigatāni ca no mahātman //
pratyarthikair iva samudyatamaṇḍalāgraiḥ skandhair hatā vayam akāraṇabaddhavairaiḥ /
āyāsitāś ca viṣayair viṣakumbhakalpais tac chidyatāṃ bhavasukhavyasanānurāgaḥ //

body.p: sa tam arhantam āha /
sa taṃ pratyāha / yady apy etad evaṃ tathāpi

lg.l: sakṛn martavye tvaṃ punar api ca mṛtyuṃ mṛgayase
sphuṭaṃ dṛṣṭvālokaṃ tamasi vipule majjasi punaḥ /
śivaṃ labdhvā mārgaṃ kusṛtim upayāsi pratibhayāṃ
bhavān yas tvaṃ vāñchasy amṛtapuram utsṛjya sulabham //

body.p:
samuttīryāgādhāt krimikulacalatpaṅkakalilāt
kathaṃ vijñābālāt pipatiṣasi tasmin punar api /

lg.l: kathaṃ vijñābālāt pipatiṣasi tasmin punar api /
vimukto rogebhyaḥ punar api ca rogāya yatase
bhavebhyo duḥkhebhyaḥ spṛhayasi punar yas tvam aghṛṇaḥ //

body.p:
anāśān asvantān sulabhavinipātapratibhayān
savairān sodvegān saparibhavasaṃtāpavirasān /

lg.l: tam uvāca mahātmānam ārujann iva vākśaraiḥ //
bhramanti te bahūn kalpān bodhisattvā bhavādhvani /
sa bhikṣus tena vākyena pratodeneva vikṣataḥ /
na tena viditā bhikṣo yā vyathā bhramatāṃ bhave /

body.p: punaś ca tvāṃ bravīmi /

lg.l: yeṣāṃ kleśāvaśeṣo 'py upaśamitabalo yo 'py upādānam eva /
ātmatvenābhyupetā jagad idam akhilaṃ ye kṛpākrāntacittās
teṣāṃ ślāghyā pravṛttir gatiṣu na tu bhavāsvādaparyastabuddhiḥ //

body.p:
spṛśyante sattvavanto na viṣayarajasā ye viviktāśayatvād
duḥkhair naiva vyathante kṣitidharaguravo ye parārthe carantaḥ /

lg.l: duḥkhair naiva vyathante kṣitidharaguravo ye parārthe carantaḥ /
śobhante na kṣamaṃ tu kṣaṇam api gatiṣu sthātum ātmaṃbharīṇām //

body.p:
yeṣāṃ sarve prayogāḥ śaśina iva kalāḥ sarvasattvopajīvyā
ye lokān pānti kṛtsnān pitara iva sutān duḥkhapātālamagnān /

lg.l: ye lokān pānti kṛtsnān pitara iva sutān duḥkhapātālamagnān /
svārthodyogānurāgād anupatati bhavān mṛtyave kevalaṃ tu //

body.p:
yeṣām utpādakāle sucaritakiraṇair likhyamānaṃ samantād
dhvāntaṃ cetaḥ svaraṅgāvivaraparicayasphītam apy astam eti /

lg.l: dhvāntaṃ cetaḥ svaraṅgāvivaraparicayasphītam apy astam eti /

body.p: kiṃ bahunā
evam apy asāv ucyamānaḥ kuśaladharmasādhanodyogavidhura eva vyāhārṣīt /

lg.l: prakṣālayanti munayo na jalena pāpaṃ hastena nāpy apaharanti janasya duḥkham /
saṃcārayanty adhigamaṃ na paratra ca svaṃ dharmān vadanti tu sukhapratipattisādhyān //

body.p: atha sa krameṇa kālagato bharukacche proṣitabhartṛkāyā nāryāḥ kukṣau janma pratisaṃdadhe / kālāntareṇa ca garbhād abhiniṣkrāntaḥ / mātā cainam abhivīkṣya putrasneham anādṛtyāpavādabhayāśaṅkinī kim api kim api tapasvinī vilalāpa / anunīyamānāpi ca samānasukhaduḥkhābhiḥ sakhībhir asahamānā tanayaviyogavyasanaṃ tam atimanoharātmabhāvaṃ bālakam aṅke kṛtvā bāṣpavegoparudhyamānaskhalitavacasā niyatam īdṛśaṃ kiṃ cid avocat /

lg.l: jāte putre bhavanti pramuditahṛdayā mātaro jīvaloke
dṛṣṭvā vaṃśasya lakṣmīm anuparatarasām unmiṣantīṃ samantāt /
ānandāndolitānāṃ bhavati sa divaso bāndhavānām adīrgho
jātaḥ śokāya tu tvaṃ mama tanaya kathaṃ mandabhāgyodayāyāḥ //

body.p:
durvṛttāyā mama tad adhunā karmaṇā preritas tvaṃ
bhuṅkṣvāsahyaṃ vyasanam athavā svasya duśceṣṭitasya /

lg.l: ete 'nye ca vyasananivahā mūrdhni teṣāṃ sphuranti
tyaktvā lajjāṃ sujanadayitāṃ ye pramādaṃ bhajante //
putra durnayaphalāni bhokṣyase mātur adya parimāṇavartakaḥ //
dhig dhig astu pariṇāmadāruṇāṃ saṅgināṃ ratim apūrvavāhinīm /
adhyavasyati yayābhibhūtadhīr īdṛśāny api jano hatatrapaḥ //
kaṣṭam āyataviṣādabhīṣaṇe saṃkaṭe mama vivartate manaḥ /
yatra lokaravabhītayā mayā putraka tvam aṭavīṃ nipātyase //
dāruṇaṃ bata bidher viceṣṭitaṃ duṣkaraṃ khalu mayā samīhitam /
kiṃ karomi śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi kaṃ putra śokaśaratāḍitāśayā //
yat suduṣkaram idaṃ kariṣyate vaiśasaṃ vihatalajjayā mayā //
bhūr iyaṃ kim iti nāvadīryate nārakaḥ kva nu sa havyavāhanaḥ /
yo na nirdahati pāpakāriṇīṃ kakṣamuṣṭim iva māṃ hatatrapām //
vitataśikhikalāpodbhāsurālokajālaṃ nipatati mama vajraṃ sāṃprataṃ kiṃ tu mūrdhni /
sutam akaruṇacittā yāham evaṃ tyajāmi stanarasaparibhogaklībavaktrāravindam //

body.p: ity evam anyathā ca tasyā vilapantyāḥ kiṃciccheṣā rajanī babhūva / sā paricārikām abravīt / jñāyatāṃ tāvad bhadre kim avaśeṣaṃ niśāyā iti / sābravīt / svāmini saṃprati hi
sā provāca /

lg.l: durjātaṃ mama mandāyā gaccha cchoraya bālakam //

body.p: ity uktvā sā bāṣpavegoparudhyamānahṛdayā pṛthivyāṃ sahasā nipapāta / paraṃ ca saṃmoham upajagāma /

lg.l: sā tatheti pratiśrutya tam ādāya tapasvinam /

body.p:
putrakrauryaṃ vivṛtam aśivaṃ janmaduḥkhopataptaṃ
bhartṛsnehaḥ ciraparicayād baddhamūlo na dṛṣṭaḥ /

lg.l: nāsau rurāvāmuṣitasmṛtitvāc cukopa mātre na ca tattvadarśī /
dṛṣṭvā tu tām ātmagatām avasthāṃ svam eva cittaṃ vinininda bālaḥ //
nāyaṃ jananyā mama kāmacāro na cānimittaṃ vyasanaṃ mamedam /
svayaṃ kṛtāni vyasanāny amūni tvayaiva me citta vimuñca dainyam //
bhavopabhogeṣv adhunā viṣādaṃ kim eva mohād asamīkṣyakārin //
hitaiṣiṇas tasya vaco 'vadhīrya tvam ajña nirdagdhapunarbhavasya /
bibheṣi duḥkhād adhunā kim evaṃ svakarmanirmāṇam idaṃ tavaiva //
na pūjayanti pratipattibhir ye giro gurūṇām anukampakānām /
imāni cānyāni ca te labhante viṣādanīnāṃ vipadāṃ śatāni //

body.p: yathā yathā tīvradvandvopanipātajāni duḥkhāny anubhavati sma tathā tathā sutarām upajāyamānasaṃvegaḥ sāśrukaṇṭha eva śuśoca viklavātmā tapasvī /

lg.l: mama gurur asau tyaktvā yāto bhavābdhikadurbhavān /
bhavajalanidher dṛṣṭvāpy antaṃ punar nidhanaṃ gatāḥ //

body.p:
matihutabhujā dagdhvā skandhapravṛttiviṣadrumaṃ
sthitiṣu vaśitāṃ saṃprāpyāpi prakāśayaśotsavāḥ /

sthānāsthānavivekayogaviduṣā sthānena saṃvarṇitā
skandhānāṃ kṣaṇikāpy anuttaragirā nirvṛttir āyāsinī /

lg.l: sthāne prajvalitāṃs tarūn iva khagās tyaktvā bhavān bhaṅgurān
kṛtvābhiyogam api cāgamagahvareṣu svairapracāram anugṛhya mano manuṣyāḥ /
alpaśrutā iti jagaty upayānti saṃkhyāṃ cetovinigrahaphalaṃ śrutam āhur āryāḥ //
sa sūcikāgrair iva tudyamānaḥ pipīlikair bhugnakarāladaṃṣṭraiḥ /
sa makṣikāṇāṃ nayutaiḥ parīto mṛduḥ prayatnākulapāṇipādaḥ /
viceṣṭamānaḥ karuṇaṃ kathaṃ cid bhavān jagarhe manasānutāpī //

body.p:
krūrārāvaiḥ purabalibhujāṃ maṇḍalaiḥ saṃpatadbhir
vyādhūtāsyo vipadam aśivāṃ yo 'svatantraḥ prapede /

lg.l: kravyāśināṃ paravadhapraṇayapragalbhaiḥ pūgair asau parivṛto vigatāsukalpaḥ /
prākhyāpayat sa bhavabhogalavābhilāṣaduḥkhāni tasya ca vaco vigatasravasya //

body.p: tasya tathā kṛcchragatasya puradvāri parivartamānasya gavāṃ nirgacchantīnāṃ puraḥsaro vṛṣabhas tam āyuṣmantaṃ dṛṣṭvā vidhiyogasāmarthyāt pitevopagu tāvad avatasthe yāvad atikrāntaḥ sarvo gaugaṇaḥ / so 'titīvravedanāturatanur alpasthāmatayā kaṇṭhagataprāṇaḥ punar api mayā vyasanam evānubhavanīyaṃ maraṇād ūrdhvam ity abhiviṣādo 'pi mṛtyur eva tatkāladuḥkhapratīkāram ākārayatu / vanavihagapakṣapātoddhṛtadharaṇitalarajo'vakīrṇadeho nirākrando mandam aparispandakaracaraṇavadanakamala idānīṃ na bhaviṣyāmīti buddham eva bhagavantaṃ namaskartum ārabdhaḥ / tadbhāgyaśeṣopakṛṣṭā iva copāsakā buddhadharmasaṃghānuvādāśrayāḥ saṃkathāḥ kathayantas taṃ pradeśam upajagmuḥ / sa tān avalokya pratyujjīvita iva mṛdusphuṭakalena vacasā kamalapalāśakomalaṃ pāṇim abhiprasāryābravīt / bho bhoḥ satpuruṣā muhūrtakaṃ tāvad asmadanukampayāvatiṣṭhadhvam iti / atha te sahasā tacchabdaśravaṇasaṃbhrāntāḥ kim idaṃ kathaṃ cety utpannavimarśāḥ sthitā vayaṃ bhadramukhete taṃ mahāsattvam āśvāsayāṃ babhūvuḥ / kautūhalākulasamāsāś ca punar evam ūcuḥ /

lg.l: avasthāṃś ca vayaś cedaṃ vāksauṣṭhavam idaṃ ca te /
tat saumya vada ko nāma tvaṃ devo 'py atha dānavaḥ /

body.p: sa tān āha /

lg.l: mānuṣo 'smi mahāsattvā nāhaṃ devo na dānavaḥ /
bhavasaṃbhogatarṣeṇa prāptas tv aham imāṃ daśām //
vistaraṃ śrotum icchāmaḥ sa cet khedaṃ na manyase //
sa tān ity avadad yūyaṃ dharmabhrātara eva me /
duḥkhāni tāvad vāryantāṃ paścād vakṣyāmi vistaram //
tatheti ca pratiśrutya gṛhītvā pāṇibhiḥ śanaiḥ /
prasvasthakāyaḥ sa samāhitātmā catvāri satyāni yathekṣitāni /
parīkṣamāṇo na cireṇa sādhur malān yathāsthūlamayāṃś cakāra //
– anuśayaviśeṣaṃ bhāvanāmārgaheyaṃ – ravir iva niśāntadhvāntam ullikhya bhābhiḥ /

body.p: atha sa mahātmā kṛtakaraṇīyaḥ kṣaṇam apy avasthāṃ tāṃ parityajya sabahumānaḥ kevalaṃ teṣām upāsakānāṃ kṛtajñatām anurakṣan paryaṅkaṃ gaganatale baddhvā taiḥ sabahumānam udīkṣyamāṇo vistareṇa tebhyo yathāvṛttaṃ vyāhṛtya punar api tān ābabhāṣe /

lg.l: abhinandati yo janma sa duḥkham abhinandati /
viṣopadigdhā niśitā ivāyasāḥ śikhā ivāgneḥ prabalānilākulāḥ /
sabhīmanādā iva cāśmavṛṣṭayaḥ pravṛttayo duṣprasahāḥ śarīriṇām //
paraṃ samutkṣipya nipātayaty adho vipattipātālatale duruttare //
upādadānasya na jātv imāṃ śivaṃ narasya saṃskāravikārasaṃkulām //
janāḥ saroṣā iva nirdahanty amī svam indriyagrāmam anarthapaṇḍitāḥ //
arīn imān ātmasamudbhavān bhavān sukhābhimānāś chalitāḥ śarīriṇaḥ //
niśamya ko nāma viḍambanām imāṃ pumān madīyāṃ śravaṇopatāpinīm /
ta eva santaḥ sukham adhyupāsate sanātanaṃ śāntam atītamānuṣam /
hatāvalepāḥ pariśuddhavṛttayaḥ sthitās ta evopari sarvasaṃpadām /
na bhāvanāṃ ye ślathayanti sādhavaḥ pravṛttyupādānaviṣopaśāntaye //
saṃvejya parṣadam ṛṣiḥ sa upāsakānāṃ sadyo yayau praśamam agnir ivāmbuṣiktaḥ //

body.p: iti bhavalubdhakāvadānam //
Kapīśvarajātakam = GoKī

based on the edition by Michael Hahn. "Gopadatta's Kapīśvarajātaka ḥ Re-edited and translated", Bukkyḥ Bunka Kenkyūjo Kiyḥ [= Bulletin of Research Institute for Buddhist Culture, Ryukoku University] 46 (2007), pp. 47-74.
4. Kapīśvarajātakam = GoKī

lg.l: abhyasyanti tathā tathāgatasutās tyāgaṃ yathā svān api
prāṇān prāṇikṛte tyajanti kṛpayā rogān ivāyāsinaḥ /
kṣudrāḥ pāpavidhau tathā tv abhiratiṃ badhnanti niḥsādhvasā

body.p: tadyathānuśrūyate

bodhisattvaḥ kilānyatamasmin vividhavarṇagandharasasaṃpannaphalabhārāvanatadrumopagūḍhe vikacasurabhikusumavallīvirājitaparyante marakatamaṇiprabhāharitaśādvalakuthāstīrṇaviṣamabhūmibhāge kamalakuvalayākaronmīlitavimalajalāśayaparigrahe mahaty araṇye vānarādhipatir babhūva //

lg.l: gatiṃ tiraścām adhamāṃ prapede sādhuḥ sa kenāpi tu kāraṇena //
śubhāśubhaiḥ karmabhir āryakarmā krīḍann ivāsau bhavaraṅgamadhye /
babhūva tasya tv anavadyabuddheḥ śubhāśubhe karmaṇi kāmakāraḥ //
āryām udbhāvayām āsa paddhatiṃ sa śivodayām //

body.p: sa tatra mātaram andhāṃ vṛddhāṃ ca paricaran vivekakāmatayā ca svayūtham apahāya teṣu teṣu puṣpaphalasamṛddheṣu vanāntareṣv anutkaṇṭhitamanā vijahāra /

lg.l: aṃsena tāṃ pariharan viṣameṣu deśeṣv amlāyinīṃ srajam ivādhipatiḥ kapīnām /
ānṛṇyam apratisamaṃ sa jagāma mātur garbhādidhāraṇapariśramakheditāyāḥ //
pākopapāditarasaiḥ sa phalaprakārair niṣprāṇakaiś ca madhubhiḥ kusumādhivāsaiḥ /
toyaiś ca phullakamalotpalinīmanojñais tāṃ mātaraṃ paricacāra viśuddhasattvaḥ //

body.p: atha kadā cid anyatamo vyādho dhanvī pṛṣṭhāvāpī pragāḍhāvabaddhaparikaro mālutāvatānasaṃyatākulakeśabhārabhāsuraḥ śvāpadān abhidravaṃs taṃ deśam abhijagāma /

lg.l: dṛṣṭvā mṛtyum ivāpatantam atha taṃ tadgocarāḥ prāṇino
yātāḥ kvāpi vilaṅghya kaṇṭakalatānaddhān prapātān api //

body.p: atha sa durātmā viphalaprayāsatayā sutarāṃ krodhāgninā pradīptamānasaḥ saśiraḥprakampaṃ niśvasya ca palāśikayāvagṛhya lalāṭapuṭaprasvedasalilaṃ tam evānukampamānaṃ taṃ vānarādhipatiṃ dadarśa pādapaikadeśāvasthitam / dṛṣṭvā ca bhṛśataraṃ krodhavahninā prajajvāla /

atha sa durātmā dhanuṣi niśitaṃ sāyakaṃ saṃdhāya vegena bodhisattvam abhidudrāva / sa ca mahātmā lobhanīyataraṃ vapur avetya mayi ca nāsyāyaṃ nirbandha iti / śakto 'pi pratyavasthātum apagatasaṃrambhamānasaḥ khaga iva mahatā javena tadbāṇapatham aticakrāma /

lg.l: muṣṭiprahāreṇa sa śailaśṛṅgaṃ śakto 'pi saṃcūrṇayituṃ mahātmā /
jālmaṃ tam eva tv anukampamānas tadbāṇasaṃpātapathād vyatītaḥ //

body.p: sa ca puruṣādhamas tīvratarasaṃrambhamanyuvegākulīkṛtāśayas tāṃ bodhisattvajananīṃ pratyākṛṣṭatīkṣṇabāṇāśanir abhisasāda /

lg.l: pāpakriyāyām avicārya kāryaṃ caranti lokasya niraṅkuśāni //

body.p: atha bodhisattvaḥ purāyaṃ me mātaraṃ vyāpādayatīty avigaṇitasvaprāṇātyayaḥ sasaṃbhramadrutataragatir abhigamya taṃ vyādhaṃ sānunayapraśamamadhuram ity abravīt /

lg.l: tiṣṭha tiṣṭha mahāsattva mā vadhīr jananīṃ mama /
kas tavemāṃ guṇo hatvā vṛddhāṃ proṣitalocanām //
vyāpādayitum ambāṃ me sādhos tava na yujyate //
purātanair eva hatāṃ karmabhiḥ paruṣair imām /
ghnato niraparādhāṃ te kathaṃ notpadyate dayā //
na lajjase kathaṃ nāma muñcañ chākhāmṛgītanau //
niyujyamānau kṛpaṇāśrayeṣu daurbhāgyam udbhāvayataḥ sphuṭaṃ te //
amuktapūrvo hariṇāṅganāsv apy akṣūṇalakṣas tava kaṅkapattraḥ /
tasmād udvīkṣasva paraṃ ca lokam imāṃ ca vṛddhām aparāyaṇāṃ tvam /

body.p: evam apy asāv ucyamānaḥ krauryābhyāsakaṭhorahṛdayapāṣāṇas tad bodhisattvavacanam ākarṇyaivāvadhīrayām āsa /
atha vānareśvaras tam anāryakarmāṇam anunayavidhuram avagamya cintām āpede /

lg.l: mātary ayaṃ yadi mama praharaty anāryaḥ saṃpaśyato mama vadhaḥ sakalaḥ sa eva /
tyaktvā svajīvitam ataḥ paripālayāmi vṛddhām imāṃ kumudinīdhavalāṃ ca kīrtim //

body.p:
kāmaṃ mṛte mayi mariṣyati viklaveyaṃ
hā putraketi kṛpaṇā karuṇaṃ rudantī /

lg.l: draṣṭuṃ guruvyasanam asti na me prabhutvam //
jātaś ca nāma na vinakṣyati vety ayuktam utpāda eva niyamena nipātahetuḥ /
tulye ca nāma maraṇavyasanopatāpe mṛtyur varaṃ parahitāvahitāśayasya //
duḥkhaṃ tu nirgārayatīva ceto mamaikam evāvinivāryavīryam /
ambā mṛtaṃ māṃ yad iyaṃ viditvā duḥkhena saṃtyakṣyati jīvalokam //
arthāya netravyasanaṃ tu jātam asyā na māṃ drakṣyati māryamāṇam /
yad asya tīkṣṇena durādhareṇa vyādhaprayuktena śilīmukhena //
kṛtvā ca yat pāpam ayaṃ tapasvī duḥkhāni saṃprāpsyati dāruṇāni /
etan mano nirdahatīva mahyaṃ prāṇoparodhaṃ svam acintayitvā //
dhig astu saṃkleśapiśācavaiśasaṃ pṛthagjanatvaṃ dhig anarthapaṇḍitam /
vipattipātālatale duruttare vṛthaiva yal lokam imaṃ vimuñcati //

body.p: atha sa prakṛtiśuddhasattvas tadavastho 'py anabhijātaviṣādadainyasaṃbhramamanās taṃ vyādham abravīt /

lg.l: amogho yad ayaṃ bāṇas tvayā tāta samudyataḥ /
mayi prahara niḥśaṅkaṃ mā kārṣīr mṛtamārikām //

body.p: atha sā vṛddhā vānarī taṃ bodhisattvasyātiduṣkaraṃ hṛdayasaṃtāpakaraṃ vyavasāyam avetya pāṇibhyāṃ hṛdayam abhighnantī sāśrukaṇṭhā gadgadāyamānavacanā bodhisattvam āha /

lg.l: putra mā sāhasaṃ kārṣīr mayy eva praharatv ayam /
yad ahaṃ tāta jīvāmi durmanā duḥkhabhāginī /
tvatsaṅgamasukhābhyāsaṃ rasāgraṃ na varaṃ hi tat //
nimīlite tvayi vyaktaṃ diśaḥ sarvā nimīlitāḥ //
tvayi jīvati jīvantīṃ mām avehi mṛtām api //

body.p: atha bodhisattvo 'bhipraṇamyānuneṣyann anukampāśītalair api nirdahann iva vacobhir jananīṃ praty āha /

lg.l: kṣudrajantor api kṛte jahyāṃ dehaśatāny api /
mātur arthe tyajed deham itaro 'pi gatavyathaḥ //
na ca me kāyikaṃ duḥkhaṃ tathā janayati vyathām /
duḥkhaṃ manomayaṃ soḍhuṃ kathaṃ śakṣyāmi duḥsaham //

body.p: api cāmba /

lg.l: sarve saṃnicayāḥ kṣayāntavirasā dīpāḥ prabhāteṣv iva /

body.p: atha sā bodhisattvajananī śītair ananyasattvasadṛśaiḥ karuṇāniṣyandabhūtaiḥ snehātiśayodgāribhiḥ svajīvitanirapekṣair aparimlāyamānagauravaprasādapeśalais tadvacobhiḥ sutarām ākleditahṛdayā vyāpinā svareṇa tad vanam āpūrayantī sakaruṇaṃ virurāva /

lg.l: amūni tava vākyāni śītāny api dahanti mām /

body.p:
hā mātṛvatsala ripuṣv api maitracitta
kṣudreṣv api prakṛtibhadra mṛdusvabhāva /

lg.l: putrāpahāya kṛpaṇāṃ kva nu yāsyasi tvaṃ
hā hā hatāsmi kṛpaṇā cyutabhāgadheyā daivena sādhujananirdayapauruṣeṇa /
saṃrakṣa māṃ suciram ekapade jahāsi kiṃ putrakādya nanu saiva tavāsmi mātā //

body.p:
yātāḥ kva te 'dya munayo jvalitaprabhāvāḥ
sakhyaḥ kva tāḥ pratigatā vanadevatās te /

lg.l: sakhyaḥ kva tāḥ pratigatā vanadevatās te /
saṃśāntā vanarājayaś ca śikhinā sudyotitāś candrakair
bhānor aṃśukarālitāś ca divasā rakṣantu me putrakam //
acetanānām api pādapānāṃ babhūva kampo ruditena tena /
mṛdūkṛtaṃ tasya na nāma ceto manāg api krūramanorathasya //

body.p: atha sa durātmā tadvākyaśravaṇajvalitakopānalādīptahṛdayaḥ kathāparyavasānam avigaṇayyaiva bodhisattvaṃ tīkṣṇena bāṇena marmadeśe 'bhihatya prāṇair viyojayāṃ babhūva /

viśuṣkajalabhairavāḥ pradaragahvarāḥ sindhavo
dvitīya iva bhāskare samudite 'bhavaṃs tatkṣaṇam /
atha sa dasyus tad atidāruṇaṃ karma kṛtvā sadyas tadvipākacihnākulīkṛtahṛdayaḥ svam āvāsam abhipratasthe / tatra ca tatkarmāparādhena bhairavo niṣpratīkārarabhasajvālāmālākulo mahadagniḥ prajajvāla /

lg.l: sadyo 'gniḥ pariṣaṣvaje priyam iva jvālābhujair āyataiḥ /
āliṅgito 'sau kaṭhināntarātmā mumoha hā heti ca saṃrurāva //
nipapāta samutpapāta cāsāv asakṛn mīna ivāturas tapasvī //

body.p:
tasyāsthiśeṣam api kāpuruṣasya dagdhvā
vahniḥ saroṣa iva naiva śaśāma śīghram /

lg.l: vahniḥ saroṣa iva naiva śaśāma śīghram /
rejus te pralayavilīyamānasānor niryāsāḥ kanakagirer iva sravantaḥ //

body.p:
dagdho duścaritāgnibhiḥ sa paruṣair dagdhaḥ punaḥ pāvakaiḥ
pāpātmā sakalatraputravibhavaḥ śuṣko yathā pādapaḥ /

lg.l: taṃ bhūyo 'pi dadāha dāruṇataraḥ karmendhano nārako

body.p:
avetya pāpakarmaṇām idaṃ vipākavaiśasaṃ
vivarjayed asatkriyāṃ bhujaṅgamāṅganām iva /
// iti śrīkapīśvarajātakaṃ navatriṃśattamam //
Maitrakanyaka = GoMk
based on the edition by Konrad Klaus. Das Maitrakanyakāvadāna (Divyāvadāna 38), Bonn 1983 (Indica et Tibetica, 2).
5. Maitrakanyaka
mātary apakāriṇaḥ prāṇina ihaiva vyasanaprapātapātālāvalambino bhavantīti satatasamupajāyamānapremaprasādabahumānamānasaiḥ satpuruṣair mātaraḥ śuśrūṣaṇīyāḥ /
tadyathānuśrūyate

vikasitasitakumudendukundakusumāvalīguṇagaṇavibhūṣitaḥ pūrvajanmāntaropāttāprameyānavadyavipulasakalasaṃbhāro dhanadasamānaratnāśrayaḥ svajanakṛpaṇavanīpakabhujyamānodāravibhavasāranicayo mitro nāma sārthavāho babhūva /

lg.l: tasyāryasattvasya nabhasy anabhre karā ivendoḥ kumudāvadātāḥ //

body.p:
dṛṣṭvā lokam imaṃ dhanakṣayabhayāt saṃtyaktadānotsavaṃ
lobhakleśapiśācikāvaśatayā saṃdūṣitādhyāśayam /

yeṣu vyāsajya ceto bhujagavaravadhūbhogabhīmeṣu lubdhā
gāhante pāpagartaṃ sphuṭadahanaśikhābhīmaparyantarandhram /

tasyāputradhanatvāt putrābhilāṣiṇo yadā manorathaśatair asakṛd unmiṣitonmiṣitāḥ putraśriyaḥ prasahya sphītataravairabhārendhanavahnineva vigatanikhilapratīkāradāruṇaprabhāvamahatāśu kṛtāntālayaikaparāyaṇāḥ kriyante sma tadāsau lokapravādamātrayāpi panthānaṃ samavatīrya dhanadavaruṇakuberaśaṃkarajanārdanapitāmahādīn devatāviśeṣān putrārthaṃ yācitum ārebhe /

lg.l: tat tat tasya prabālavirasāṃ yāti tīkṣṇāṃśumālaiḥ
śoṣaṃ ninye ravir iva jalaṃ bhāgadheyārkabimbam //

body.p:
rudraṃ naikakapālaśekharadharaṃ cakrāyudhaṃ vajriṇaṃ
sraṣṭāraṃ makaradhvajaṃ girisutāputraṃ mayūrāsanam /

lg.l: gaṅgāṃ śaṅkhadalāvadātasalilāṃ tāṃ tāṃś ca devān asau
putrārthī śaraṇaṃ yayau bahu punar dānaṃ dvijebhyo dadau //
yad yaj jano maṅgaladeśanābhir vratopavāsādhigataiś ca duḥkhaiḥ /
putrārthasaṃsiddhinimagnabuddhir vikṣipya khedaṃ sa cakāra tāṃs tān //

body.p: evam anekaprakāraṃ kāyacetassor āyāsakāribhir api vratopavāsamaṅgalair yadā naiva kadā cit kāle 'sya putrā jīvino babhūvus tadaivam ativipule pragāḍhaśokāpagāmbhasi nimajjantaṃ kaś cit sādhupuruṣo 'bravīt /

lg.l: bhūtānāṃ tuṅgaśṛṅgāc ca vinipāto na bhūtaye //
na ca te 'dyāpi jīvanti tatra kiṃ parikhidyase //
karmāṇi nirmucya kathaṃ bhavebhyaḥ svargaukasas tuṣṭivaśād iheyuḥ /
ye yair vinā nātmabhavaṃ labhante te tair vinā janma kathaṃ bhajeran //

body.p:
ye sāṃsārikanaikaduḥkhadahanajvālālatāliṅgitās
te vāñchanti narāmaroragasukhaṃ prāyeṇa dānādibhiḥ /

lg.l: yas tvaṃ dyām adhigantum icchasi bṛhatsopānamālāśrayāt //

body.p:
vidhim aparam ahaṃ te bodhayāmi prasiddhyai
tvam api ca kuru tāvat saṃprasiddhyai kadā cit /

lg.l: tvam api ca kuru tāvat saṃprasiddhyai kadā cit /
yadi bhavati sutas te kanyakānāma tasya

body.p: atha tasya kālāntare gaganatalam aṃśumālīva svakiraṇanikarair virājamānaṃ svavaṃśalakṣmīḥ putraṃ janayāṃ babhūva / sa ca

bhūyaḥ kalpasahasrasaṃcitamahāpuṇyaprabhāvodbhavaiḥ
pravyaktasphuritendracāparuciraiḥ prahlādibhir lakṣaṇaiḥ /

lg.l: mūrtis tasya rarāja meruśikharād dhemaṃ yathā bhūcyutaṃ

body.p:
bhramaracamarapaṅktiśyāmakeśābhirāmaṃ
samavipulalalāṭaṃ śrīmaduttuṅganāsam /

lg.l: dhātrībhiḥ sa samunnītaḥ kṣīraiś ca sarpimaṇḍakaiḥ /
pupoṣa sundaraṃ dehaṃ hradastham iva paṅkajam //
atha tasya pitā mitraḥ sārthavāho vaṇigjanaiḥ /
dravyair vahanam āropya jagāhe toyadhiṃ mudā //
pitur vyatīte jananīṃ jagāda cakāra kiṃ karma pitā mameti //

body.p: tato 'sya jananī pativiyogaśokaglapitahṛdayā cintām āpede /

lg.l: eṣo 'pi mama mandāyā nāśam eṣyati toyadhau //

body.p:
yāvac cāyaṃ janapadam imaṃ tasya vṛttiṃ na bhūtāṃ
pṛcchaty asmai kathayati na vā sarva evaiṣa lokaḥ /

lg.l: pṛcchaty asmai kathayati na vā sarva evaiṣa lokaḥ /
tāvad yuktaṃ mama sutam imaṃ mṛtyuvaktrāntarālaṃ
paro 'pi yaḥ sādhujanānujuṣṭaṃ vihāya mārgaṃ śrayate vimārgam /
nivāraṇīyaḥ sa matāj janena prayatnataḥ kiṃ punar eva putraḥ //

body.p: tato janāni kathayāṃ cakre /
atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvo mātur vacanaṃ kusumamālām iva śirasā samabhivadyānyasminn ahani [!] aukarikāpaṇaṃ prasasāra /

puṇyasaṃbhāramahatas tasya sattvadayāvataḥ /
prathame 'hani saṃpannaṃ catuṣkārṣāpaṇaṃ dhanam //

lg.l: svagarbhasaṃdhāraṇaduḥkhitāyai dadau sa tasyai mudito jananyai /

body.p: atha ye tasmin puravare ciraṃtanā aukarikās te tasya tam abhivardhamānaṃ krayavikrayalokam aviṣamavyavahāranītyā prakṛtipremapeśalatayā cāvarjitamanasaṃ tasmin mahāsattve vyavahārārtham āpatantam avalokya taṃ tasmāt karmaṇo vinivartanārtham āhuḥ /

lg.l: gāndhikāpaṇikaḥ śreṣṭhī pitā te 'smin pure purā /
sa tvaṃ tāṃ vṛttim ujjhitvā śrayase 'nyāṃ kayā dhiyā //

body.p: atha bodhisattvas tām api jīvikām apahāya gāndhikāpaṇaṃ cakāra /

lg.l: yasminn eva dine cakre sa sādhur gāndhikāpaṇam /

body.p: tam [!] api mātre pratipāditavān / atha gāndhikāpaṇikāḥ puruṣāḥ sametyāgatya ca taṃ mahāsattvaṃ vicchandayām āsuḥ /

lg.l: gāndhāpaṇaṃ klībajanābhipannaṃ pitā na vaimadyapure cakāra /
tatraiva hairaṇyikatāṃ sa kṛtvā dhanāni bhūyāṃsi samāpa sādho //

body.p: atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvas tām api jīvikām apahāya hairaṇyikāpaṇaṃ cakāra /

lg.l: tayāpi tasmin vyavahāranītyā hairaṇyikāṃs tān abhibhūya sarvān /
lebhe dine sa prathame mahārhaḥ kārṣāpaṇān ṣoḍaśa tān dadau ca //

body.p: atha hairaṇyikāpaṇikāḥ puruṣāḥ sametyāgatya ca taṃ tasmāt karmaṇo vinivartanārtham āhuḥ /

lg.l: vivartitaṃ ślāghyam ativa puṃsāṃ na tu svavṛtteś cyavanaṃ pravṛttam //
yad āśritaṃ karma janānuvartinā tvayā vidagdhena dhanepsunādhunā /
kathaṃ na saṃprāpsyasi bhāgyasaṃpadaṃ pitur vyatīte 'pi viśālinīṃ śriyam //
tasyā [!] mahendrāmalatulyakīrteḥ sūnuḥ kathaṃ tvaṃ na bibharṣi lajjām //

body.p:
ye mṛtyuṃ gaṇayanti naiva vipadi grāmaṃ bhajante na ye
gehe bandhuṣu sūnuṣu vyapagatasnehātmanodyoginaḥ /

lg.l: te tīrtvā jaladhīn agādhasalilān āvartabhīmān budhāḥ

body.p: atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvas tebhyo 'py tathānuguṇinīṃ kathām avadhārya samudrāvataraṇakṛtavyavasāyo mātaram upasṛtyovāca / amba sārthavāhaḥ kilāsmākaṃ pitā purā tad anujñāṃ prayaccha yad aham api mahāsamudram avatariṣyāmīti / sā pūrvam eva bhartṛmaraṇaduḥkhena vigatajīvitāśā svasya tanayasya tenāsaṃlakṣitadāruṇena viyogaśokaśastreṇa bhṛśataraṃ pravidāryamāṇahṛdayā svatanayam āha /

lg.l: jīvitaṃ kasya te 'niṣṭaṃ tvayā krīḍāṃ karoti kaḥ //
daivāt kathaṃ cit saṃprāptaṃ cakṣur ekaṃ tvam adya me /
na yāvad ekaṃ mama duḥkhaśalyaṃ prayāti nāśaṃ pravidārya śokam /
kathaṃ nu tasyopari me dvitīyaṃ nipātyate pāpamayair amitraiḥ //

body.p:
yeṣāṃ ceto vividhavirasāyāsaduḥkhāprakampyaṃ
yaiḥ saṃtyaktaṃ kṛpaṇahṛdayair jīvitaṃ bhogalubdhaiḥ /

lg.l: bandhūn ajñā makaranilaye mṛtyave yānti nāśam //
saṃtyajya yātuṃ katham udyamas te mā sā kathā mānavaro madīyam //
saṃpattayo yena vaṇigjanasya tato 'ham evaṃ suta vārayāmi //

body.p: sa tasyā hitārthaṃ madhurāṇy api vacanakusumāni tṛṇam ivāvadhūya sapragalbhatayā samavalambitavikatthāśobhaṃ kiṃ cid īdṛśaṃ pratyāha /

lg.l: varaṃ naiva tu jāyeran ye jātā nirdhanā janāḥ /
jātasya yadi duḥkhāni varaṃ mṛtyur na jīvitam //
arthino mama pāpasya yānti niśvasya durmanāḥ [!] //
ye śaktihīnā vibhavārjanādau te dehino duḥkhaśataṃ sahante /
lokaṃ punar duḥkhaśatopataptaṃ draṣṭuṃ na śaknomi cirāyamāṇaḥ //
tasmād vilaṅghāmi vacas tavedaṃ yāsyāmi taṃ tvaṃ prajahīhi śokam /
tatraiva yāyāṃ nidhanaṃ samudre chinnaṃ mayā vā vyasanaṃ janasya //

body.p: atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvo mātaram apramāṇīkṛtya nirgatya gṛhād vārāṇasyāṃ puryām ātmānaṃ sārthavāham ity udghoṣayām āsa /

lg.l: putras tasya mahāsamudram acirād yāsyaty amuṣmin dine
yātuṃ ye vaṇijaḥ kṛtopakaraṇās te santu sajjā iti //

body.p: atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvo vividhopakaraṇasaṃbhārasādhanānāṃ samāgṛhītapuṇyāhaprasthānabhadrāṇām upahṛtamaṅgalavidhānānāṃ vaṇijāṃ pañcabhiḥ śataiḥ kṛtaparivāraḥ prasasāra / mātā cainaṃ gacchatīti śrutvāha / mamaikaputraka kva yāsyasīti karuṇakaruṇākranditamātraparāyaṇā komalavimalakamalavilāsālasābhyāṃ pāṇikamalābhyāṃ rucirakanakaghaṭitaghaṭavikaṭapayodharavarorubhāsuram uraḥ pragāḍham abhitāḍayati / bāṣpasaliladhārāparaṃparodbhavoparudhyamānakaṇṭhī [!] anilabalākulitagalitasajalajaladapaṭalāvalīmalinakeśapāśā satvaratvaram abhigamya maitrakanyakasya bodhisattvasya pādayoḥ pariṣvajyaivam āha / mā māṃ putraka parityajya yāsīti /

lg.l: anartharāgagrahamūḍhabuddhayo narā hi paśyanti na kevalaṃ hitam /
satāṃ hitādhānavidhānacetasāṃ giro 'pi śṛṇvanti na bhūtavādinām //

body.p: maitrakanyako 'pi
tataḥ sā mātā samutthāyāha / putraka

lg.l: vyasanaphalam anantaṃ mā tu bhūt karmaṇo 'sya

body.p: atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvo vividhavihārāyatanaparvatopavanagahvarasarittaḍāgārāmaramaṇīyatarān anekanagaranigamakarvaṭagrāmādīn anuvicaran krameṇa samudratīraṃ saṃprāpya sajjīkṛtayānapātro bhujagapativadanavisṛtaśvasanacapalānilabalavilulitavipulavimalasalilam aruṇataruṇakiraṇanikararucirapadmarāgapuñjaprabhārāgarañjitormimālājalam asurasvarasamasurasureśvarakarodarasphuritahutavahaśikhāvalīkarālavajrapatanabhayanilīnadharaṇīdharaśikharaparāhatajaloddhatottuṅgataraṅgabhaṅgaraudraṃ samudram avatatāra /

tad eva sa saṃlakṣya tīraparyantarekhaṃ prakaṭavikaṭāvartagartodarabhramadbhramitajhaṣabhujagakulamaṇḍalaṃ naikavicitrādbhutāścaryam atiśayam ambhasām ālayam atikramatas tasya dharaṇīdharaśikharavipulātmabhāvasya makarakaripater vivartamānasya samutthitair urvīdharākāradāruṇaiḥ pramuktakalakalārāvaraudrair mahadbhiḥ salilanivahair utpīḍyamānaṃ tad yānapātraṃ maraṇabhayaviṣādabhraśyamānagātrair dīnaruditākranditamātraparāyaṇaiḥ saṃyānapātrakaiḥ saha sahasaiva salilanidher adhaḥ praveṣṭum ārabdham /

lg.l: tad yānapātraṃ jaladher jalaughair āsphālyamānaṃ vidadāra madhye //
daṃṣṭrākarāle jhaṣavaktrarandhre kaś cin mamārārtaravas tapasvī /
ke cij jalodgāraniruddhakaṇṭhā jagmur nirucchvāsagiro vyasutvam //
gatvāpi ke cit phalakair mahadbhir ambhonidhes tīram avekṣamāṇāḥ /

body.p: atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvas tena mahatā vyasanopanipātenāpy anāpatitabhayaviṣādadainyāyāsamanāḥ samavalambya mahad dhairyaparākramaṃ sasaṃbhramaṃ phalakam ādāya prasasāra /

tato 'sau samapavanagamanajavajanitasavilāsagatibhiḥ salilaplavair itas tataḥ samākṣipyamāṇo nirāhāratayā ca parimlāyamānanayanavadanakamalaś cānyair bahubhir ahorātrair yathā kathaṃ cit tasya duravagāhasalilasya mahārṇavasya dakṣiṇaṃ tīradeśam āsasāda /

lg.l: tīrtvā tam ambhonidhim apragādham āsādya tīraṃ phalakaṃ mumoca /
saṃsmṛtya mātur vacanaṃ sa pāṇau vyāsajya mūrdhānam idaṃ jagāda //
śṛṇvanti ye nātmahitaṃ gurūṇāṃ vākyaṃ hitārthodayakāryabhadram /
teṣām imāni vyasanāni puṃsāṃ māyāvahanti prabhavanti mūrdhni //
prāptaṃ phalaṃ janmataroḥ sudhībhir ye mānayantīha giro gurūṇām //
mātur hitāyaiva sadodyatāyāḥ prollaṅghya vākyaṃ mama duṣkṛtasya /
puṣpaṃ yad īdṛg bharapāpadāruṇaṃ prāntaṃ gamiṣyāmi kadā phalasya //

body.p:
hutavahahatalekhātyantaparyantaraudraṃ
gaganaugraṃ vismayatyantavajram /

ye santo hitavādināṃ sphuṭadhiyāṃ saṃpādayante giraḥ
śreyas te samavāpnuvanti niyataṃ kravyādapuryāṃ yathā /

lg.l: śreyas te samavāpnuvanti niyataṃ kravyādapuryāṃ yathā /
dustare vyasanodadhau nipatitāḥ śocanti te 'haṃ yathā //

body.p: tato 'sau krameṇa khadiravaṭasaralaniculabakulatamālatālanālikeśaradrumavanagahanaṃ pravaravāraṇavarāhacamaraśarabhaśambaramahiṣaviṣāṇakarṣaṇapatitamathitavividhamālutālatājāladuḥsaṃcaraṃ kva cit kṣubhitakesarininādabhayacakitavanacarakulākīrṇacaraṇaṃ kathaṃ cid api śabaramanujajanacaraṇākṣuṇṇaparyantam anucaran kva cit sthitvaivam āha /

lg.l: hatvā pāṇitālaiḥ prayānti vivaśāḥ phutkārabhītāḥ punaḥ //

body.p:
ramye kuṅkumaśākhinām aviralacchāyākuthāśītale
mūle komalanīlaśādvalavati pravyaktapuṣpotkare /
tato nātidūram atisṛtya mahīdharavarākāraṃ parvataṃ dadarśa /
tathāparaṃ dadarśa /

lg.l: likhantaṃ karālair nabhaḥ śṛṅgajālaiḥ kṣipantaṃ mayūkhais tamaḥ sāgarāṇām /
vahantaṃ samudrāmbarām adrigurvīṃ kṣarantaṃ kva cit kāñcanāmbhaḥpravāham //

body.p:
kva cid arkamahārathacakranirvātavikhaṇḍitamayūkhakalāpakarālitanaikamahāmaṇipallavasaṃcayamaulibharāvanatonnatabhāsuravajradharaṃ
kva cid indrakarīndravimardataraṅgarayabhramitapracalatkalahaṃsakulāvalihāranabhaḥsaridambuvidhautaśilaṃ /
kva cid aṇḍajarājavilāsasamucchritapakṣamahābhujavajravipāṭitasāgaravāritaloddhṛtapannagabhogadharaṃ
dṛṣṭvaivam āha /

lg.l: darpāt kesariṇo balena mahatā pronmathyamānā gajam //

body.p: ity evam asāv atikāntāradurgaṃ salilaphalāhāramātraparāyaṇaḥ paribhramann ajñānatamaḥpaṭalāvaguṇṭhitam iva jagat saṃsārapaṅke tribhuvanasvāmīvodayad ramaṇakaṃ nāma nagaraṃ dadarśa /

lg.l: maṇikanakalatābaddhaśākhaiḥ kva cid urubhis tarubhiḥ prakāmahāri //

body.p: tatas taddarśanāt samutpannajīvitāśo 'sau ramaṇaṃ nagaram upasasarpa / tasmān nagarād viniḥsṛtya catasro 'psaraso dravitanavakanakarasarāgāvadātamūrtayaḥ pravikasitāmbujakusumarucakarucinayanayugalotpalavilāsāḥ kvaṇadruciravividhamaṇimekhalāpabhāramandavilāsagatayaḥ kanakakalaśākārapṛthutarapayodharabharāvanamitatanumadhyā divasakarakarasparśavibodhitāmlānakamalapalāśabhāsurādharakisalayā vividhavibhūṣaṇaśatā nirāmayadarśanāḥ śirasi viracitobhayakamalāñjalayo maitrakanyakasya bodhisattvasya pādayor vinyāsitaśirasaḥ prāhuḥ /

lg.l: adyaiva duhkhāni śamaṃ gatāni [!] adyaiva no jīvitagātrasāram /
yāny arjitāny anyabhavāntareṣu karmāṇi śuklāni śubhodayāni /
teṣāṃ phalaṃ vīkṣaṇam eva te 'laṃ saṅgas tvayā kiṃ punar eva dīrgham //
adyaiva mā bandhusuhṛdviyogaśokaṃ kṛthāḥ kasya na santy apāyāḥ /
dāsyo vayaṃ te 'psaraś catasraś chāyā na te laṅghayituṃ samarthāḥ //
ratnāni vāsāṃsi samujjvalāni śayyāśrayāś cārutarā vayaṃ ca /
saṃtyaktabhartā surarājayogyā śaktir vidheneha sukhaṃ bhajasva //

body.p: api ca

lg.l: duḥkhe mahaty apratikāraghore ye vartamānāś ciram udvahanti /
te duḥkhabhāropanipātamūḍhās tatraiva śīghraṃ nidhanaṃ prayānti //
nitye viyoge maraṇāt puraḥsthite śocanti te daivakṛte viyoge /
haimādriśṛṅgam iva tat puram āviśantaṃ nemuḥ kṛtāñjalipuṭā bahavo 'pi tatra //

body.p: anyaiś [!] ca punaḥ

lg.l: kiṃ dīptaraśmir vinigūḍharaśmiḥ kiṃ puṣpaketuḥ sahasāvatīrṇaḥ /
hā kiṃ vinikṣiptaharāgravajro nāthaḥ surāṇām iti tarkito 'bhūt //
tāsāṃ vilāsair gamanaiḥ salīlair hāsaiḥ kaṭākṣair madhuraiḥ pralāpaiḥ /
krīḍan sa kālaṃ na viveda yātaṃ sarvātmanā rāgaparītacetāḥ //

body.p: pratyahaṃ ca dakṣiṇena gamanaṃ vārayanti sma / so 'pi yathā yathā nivāryate tathā tathā tayā diśā gamanāyotsukamanā babhūva /

lg.l: yadi kuryād ayaṃ loke suhṛdāṃ vacanaṃ hitam /
paraiti svargaṃ pātālaśvabhre [!] ā svapnato 'pi na //

body.p: atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvas tāsām apsarasām parijñātagamanaprayojano dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi padavīm āruhya vrajan sadāmattakaṃ nāma nagaraṃ dadarśa / tasmād api nagarād aṣṭāpsarasaḥ sasaṃbhramaṃ niḥsṛtya taṃ mahāsattvaṃ praveśayām āsuḥ / tatrāpy aciraṃ ratim anubhūya pratiṣidhyamānagamanakriyas tenaiva dakṣiṇena pathā gacchan nandanaṃ nāma nagaraṃ dadarśa / tasmād api ṣoḍaśāpsarobhir abhigamya satkṛtya praveśayām āse / tatrāpi ciraṃ krīḍāṃ sevitvā tasmād api brahmottaraṃ nāma nagaraṃ prayayau / tatrāpi dvātriṃśatāpsarobhir bhūyaḥ satkāraṃ viṣayasukham bhuktvā tāḥ prāha /

lg.l: icchāmi gantum tad ahaṃ bhavantyo [!] mā matkṛte śokahrade śayidhvam /
saṃpātabhadrāṇi hi kasya nāma viśleṣaduḥkhāni na santi loke //
sthitvāpi yenaiva ciraṃ viyogaḥ śatroḥ kṛtāntād bhavitāntakāle /
tenaiva netrāśrujalārdragaṇḍān [!] yuṣmān vihāyādya yiyāsur asmi //
viśleṣaduḥkhāya ratiṃ prayānti teṣāṃ paro nāsti vimūḍhacetāḥ //

body.p: athāpsarasas tāḥ samastās tadgamanaviyogaśokaglapitaṛdayāḥ sasaṃbhramāḥ kamalakuvalayakuḍmalavilāsā nalinya iva śirasi viracitobhayakamalāñjalayaḥ prāhuḥ /

lg.l: asmāsu te kartum aniṣṭam iṣṭaṃ kathaṃ hi bhaktipraṇayārpitāsu /

body.p:
gatvā tan nagaratrayaṃ yad api he svāminn ihāpy āgataḥ
saṃprāptā viṣayopabhogamadhurāḥ saṃpattayas te ciram /

lg.l: gantavyaṃ na punas tvayā subahunā proktena kiṃ yāsi cet
saṃsmartāsi vipatsamudrapatito vākyaṃ hi no duḥkhitaḥ //

body.p: bodhisattvaḥ prāha /

lg.l: kathaṃ te nu nivāryeran nivarteran kathaṃ nu vā //
niyojanīyāḥ suhṛdaḥ suhṛdbhir yasmin hite karmaṇi nityakālam /
nivāraṇaṃ tatra tu ye prakurvate te śatravo 'mitratayā bhavanti //

body.p:
divyaṃ prāpya sukhaṃ pure ramaṇake saṃcoditaḥ karmaṇā [!]
āyāto 'smi niṣevaṇāya paramaṃ saukhyaṃ sadāmattakam /

lg.l: tasmād āgatakasya yūyam adhunā pronmūlitā bhūmayaḥ //
tasmād ato me gamanaṃ bhavantyo [!] mā vārayadhvaṃ na hi no 'sty apāyaḥ /
asmād viśeṣāṇi sukhāni manye lapsye 'ham ity uccalito 'ham adya //

body.p: ity atha mitrakanyako bodhisattvas tāsām apsarasāṃ hitam api vākyam ahitam ivāvajñayā tiraskṛtya tenaiva dakṣiṇena pathā gacchan dadarśa mahārgaḍapraṭitaprakaṭapuṭacaturdvāradāruṇaṃ sureśvareṇāpy abhedyottuṅgāyasaviśālaprākārapariveṣṭitam antarbhramaccakramaṇḍalālokapramuktadamadamāśabdagambhīrabhairavam āyasaṃ nagaraṃ tasya ca dvāradeśam upacakrāma /

lg.l: saṃprāptamātrasya tu tatkṣaṇena dvāraṃ ca visphoṭakapāṭabhāram /

body.p: tato maitrakanyako bodhisattvo 'tra viveśa /

lg.l: tatkarmavāyuprabhavair mahadbhiḥ kṣaṇād bhujāgrair iva saṃjaghāṭa //

body.p: aśrauṣīc ca pragāḍhavedanāviklavahṛdayapuruṣasyāntaḥprākārāntaratiraskṛtaparamabhīṣaṇanirnādaṃ sakalajanottrāsanam uccarantaṃ śrutvā ca dvāradeśaṃ tvaritamatir lalaṅgha /

lg.l: praviṣṭamātrasya tato dvitīyam āsphālitaṃ dvāram ivoparuddham /

body.p: tato mitrakanyako bodhisattvaḥ praviveśa /

lg.l: kṣaṇād abhūt tan nagaraṃ ca sarvaṃ bhrāntaṃ ca kṛtsnaṃ sa dadarśa bhītaḥ //

body.p: tato maitrakanyako bodhisattvaḥ paśyati sma tam atidāruṇākārapramāṇaṃ krūrajvalanamālāliṅgitam udāreṇa paṭupavanavikīryamāṇadhūmapaṭalāndhakāradurdinena sphuratsphuliṅgāvalikarāladarśanenāyasena mahatā bhramatā cakreṇa dārv iva pravidāryamāṇamūrdhānaṃ svaśiraḥpravigalitaśoṇitavasārasāhāramātravidhṛtaprāṇaśeṣaṃ samīpaṃ copagamyainaṃ paryapṛcchat /

lg.l: kiṃ nāgo 'si suro 'si kinnaravaro yakṣo 'si kiṃ mānuṣaḥ
kiṃ vidyādharasainikaḥ kim asi vā daityaḥ piśāco 'si vā /
kiṃ vākāri bhavāntareṣu bhavatā karmātiraudraṃ svayaṃ
yasyāstivyasanaṃ duruttaram idaṃ bhujyaṃ phalaṃ krandayat //

body.p: puruṣaḥ prāha /

lg.l: nāhaṃ nāgo naiva yakṣo na devo daityo nāhaṃ nāpi gandharvarājā [!] /
rakṣo nāhaṃ nāpi vidyādharo 'pi jātis tulyā saṃpratīhi tvayā naḥ //

body.p: bodhisattvaḥ prāha /

kiṃ karma bhramatā tvayā kumatinā saṃsāradurge kṛtaṃ
yenedaṃ jvalitānalaṃ śirasi te cakraṃ bhramaty āyasam /
puruṣaḥ prāha /

yāṃ loke pravadanti sādhumatayaḥ kṣetraṃ paraṃ prāṇināṃ
daivāveśavaśād akāryagurukas tasyāṃ jananyām aham /

lg.l: tenedaṃ jvalitānalaṃ śirasi me cakraṃ bhramaty āyasam //

body.p: atha bodhisattvas tasya puruṣasya pravacanapratodena saṃcoditahṛdayas tāṃ parajugupsām ātmany anupaśyann āha /

lg.l: anyaṃ jugupsāmy aham alpabuddhir ātmānam evādya nininda ajñaḥ /
yeṣu svayaṃ doṣagaṇeṣu magnas tair eva lokaṃ katham aṅkayāmi //
mayāpi yan mātari dakṣiṇīye [!] kṛto 'parādhaḥ puruṣādhamena /
tasyaiva pāpasya phalāni bhoktum ullaṅghya toyāvalim āgato 'smi //

body.p: ity atha tasya vacanānantaram eva prabhinnanavakuvalayadalanirmalān nabhastalāt sajalajaladaninādagambhīradhīrodhvanir uccacāra /

lg.l: kiṃ na paśyati karmāṇi balavanti śarīriṇām /

body.p:
ye baddhā viṣayeṇa duḥkhanigaḍe 'nāyāsakarmotkaṭe
ye tyaktvā guruvākyam andhamatayaḥ pāpāśrayaṃ kurvate /

lg.l: ye tyaktvā guruvākyam andhamatayaḥ pāpāśrayaṃ kurvate /
mānuṣyaṃ yad avāpya mūḍhamatayo dūre sthitā karmiṇaḥ //

body.p: atha tasya vacanānantaram eva karmānilavegotkṣiptam iva tac cakraṃ ciṭiciṭāyamānadahanakaṇacayodgāraraudraṃ tasya mūrdhnaḥ samabhyudgamya maitrakanyakasya bodhisattvasya śiraḥ pravidārayaṃ [!] bhramitum ārabdham /

lg.l: atha tasya vacanānantaram eva karmānilavegotkṣiptam iva tac cakraṃ ciṭiciṭāyamānadahanakaṇacayodgāraraudraṃ tasya mūrdhnaḥ samabhyudgamya maitrakanyakasya bodhisattvasya śiraḥ pravidārayaṃ [!] bhramitum ārabdham /
kṣaṇāt sa reje rudhirapravāhair mūrdhnā [!] cyutaiḥ snātasamastamūrtiḥ /

body.p: tataḥ sa puruṣo hā heti mūrdhnā [!] pravidāhajena tīvreṇa duḥkhena samākramyamāṇaśarīrakaṃ maitrakanyakaṃ bodhisattvam āha /

lg.l: saṃtyajya kasmād u purāṇi tāni prāptas tv idaṃ sthānam anantaduḥkham //
devālayaṃ divyasukhopabhogaṃ ko nāma saṃprāpya śubhair atulyaiḥ /

body.p: bodhisattvaḥ prāha /

lg.l: saṃtyajya nāgā vyasanaṃ sahante yayā tayecchālatayāgato 'ham //
yuddhe mriyante bahavo narendrā yayā tayecchālatayāgato 'ham //
mahodadhau yānti narāḥ praṇāśaṃ yayā tayecchālatayāgato 'ham //
teṣāṃ munīnāṃ vigatavyathānāṃ deyaṃ kathaṃ pādarajo na mūrdhni /
kiṃ tad bhaved duḥkham atīvatīvraṃ kā vā vipattir bahuduḥkhayoniḥ /

body.p: api ca he sādho

lg.l: karṣati prāṇinas tatra phalaṃ yatra prayacchati //

body.p: api ca

lg.l: pradīptam āyasaṃ cakraṃ mama mūrdhni bhramiṣyati //

body.p: puruṣaḥ prāha /

lg.l: pradīptam āyasaṃ cakraṃ tava mūrdhni bhramiṣyati //

body.p: bodhisattvaḥ prāha /

etad bhāsuravahnipiṅgalaśikhājvālākalāpojjvalaṃ
ko 'nyo 'vabhramitaṃ prayāsyati samaṃ chittvā paraḥ caiṣyati /
puruṣaḥ prāha /

lg.l: yo mātary apakārakāryam aparaḥ kṛtvā samāyāsyati
tasyedaṃ śirasi bhramiṣyati punar mūrdhnā [!] tava pracyutaḥ //

body.p: atha bodhisattvas tena mūrdhnā [!] pravidāhajena tīvreṇa duḥkhena samākulahṛdayo 'pi sattveṣv ananteṣu samutpāditatīvrakāruṇyāśayas taṃ puruṣam ābabhāṣe /

lg.l: sphuritakaṭakahārāḥ prajvalanmaulayo ye punar amarasamūhās te 'pi śṛṇvantu santaḥ //

body.p:
kṛtvā duścaritaṃ svamātari jagat kṛtsnaṃ yadi prodvahed
etatprajvalitāgnirāgakapilaṃ cakraṃ bṛhan mūrdhani /

lg.l: kalpān kalpasamair ahobhir ayutān voḍhuṃ cirāyotsahe
sattvārthaṃ pratipadya mānava hi me cittaṃ na saṃkhidyate //

body.p: atha tasya sarvasattvapriyasya maitrakanyakasya bodhisattvasya vacanānantaram eva mūrdhnā [!] samutpatyotkṣiptam iva tac cakraṃ saptatālocchrayāc cākraṃ nabhastalaṃ samutpatyāvatasthe /

lg.l: raver mayūkhāṅkuradanturāntarād diśaḥ samantād dadṛśuḥ sphuṭaśriyaḥ //
payomucaḥ kiṃcidavāśrutāmbhaso vitānavad vyomani te virejire //
srajo vicitrā vinipetur ambarād vituṣṭuvur harṣatarā divaukasaḥ /
cirapragāḍhavyasanā hatārtayaḥ kṣaṇād abhūvan bahavo nirāmayāḥ //

body.p:
jvalati viṣamacakre prāntadīrṇordhvakāyo
galitarudhiradhārāsiktasarvāṅgakāyaḥ /

lg.l: svagṛham iva sa sādhur dyām ayāt tatkṣaṇena //
tatrastho 'py aciraṃ reme dṛṣṭvā lokaṃ kṛpānvitaḥ //

body.p: tat kim idam upanītam / evaṃ hi mātary apakāriṇaḥ prāṇina ihaiva vyasanaprapātapātālāvalambino bhavantīti satatasamupajāyamānapremaprasādabahumānamānasaiḥ satpuruṣair mātaraḥ śuśrūṣaṇīyā iti //
iti śrīdivyāvadāne maitrakanyakāvadānaṃ samāptam //
Matsarananda = GoMn
based on the edition by Ratna Handurukande. Five Buddhist Legends in the Campū Style - From a collection named Avadānasārasamuccaya. Bonn 1984 (Indica et Tibetica, 4).
7. Matsarananda

lg.l: svayaṃkṛtaḥ sarvasukhoparodhī mātsaryatulyo 'sti kalir na loke /

body.p: evam idam ucyamānam alaṃ saṃvegāya / tadyathānuśrūyate /

śrāvastyāṃ nando nāma sārthavāḥ prativasati sma / tasya janmāntare pātrātiśayapratipāditatvāt taddānabījasyāparimāṇo bhogaskandhaḥ prādur babhūva / mātsaryābhyāsāt tu notsahate sma kiṃ cid api kasmai cit pradātum /

lg.l: dātuṃ kiṃ cit prabhavati tadā matsarākrāntacetāḥ //

body.p:
tyāgasyaiva phalānubandhamadhurāṃ citrāṃ vipākaśriyaṃ
saṃprāpya praharanty anartharucayo mūleṣu ye saṃpadām /

lg.l: saṃprāpya praharanty anartharucayo mūleṣu ye saṃpadām /
te saṃtyajya nidāghakālasubhagān indoḥ karāñ śīkarān
naivātmanāsau bubhuje kadaryo bhogān dadau nāpi suhṛjjanebhyaḥ /
praviṣṭapūrvā na gṛhaṃ kadā cid dvijātayas tasya kapālahastāḥ /
vanīyakās tasya gṛhājirebhyo vrajanti niśvasya viśuṣkavaktrāḥ /
baliṃ na kākā api nāma tasya smaranti sikthaprakaropahāram //
vivāhakāleṣv api nāma tasya vāditraśabdo na samuccacāra /
āvāhakāleṣv api tasya gehe suhṛjjanā dīnamukhā babhūvuḥ //
dūrāt śmaśānam iva tasya vivarjya gehaṃ anyena yācakajanas tvaritaṃ jagāma /
nāmāpi tasya parikīrtya kila prabhāte lebhe na kaś cid aśanaṃ divasāvasāne //
śrutvāpi dānaniyatāṃ sa kathāṃ cakampe dṛṣṭvāpi yācanakam udvijate kadaryaḥ /
tyāgapriyaiḥ saha cakāra na lokayātrāṃ nando jahāsa kila dāyakam īkṣamāṇaḥ //
dṛṣṭvā parasyāpi sa deyadharmān īrṣyākaṣāyākṣipuṭo babhūva /
tyāgātmabhiḥ sārdham anāryakarmā cakāra naiva krayavikrayaṃ saḥ //

body.p: atha nandaḥ kadā cin niṣpratīkāraparuṣavedanākrāntadeho niyatam ahaṃ mariṣyāmīty utpannabhayaviṣādaśokadainyamānasaḥ putraṃ candanam āhūyābravīt / vatsa candana mayā hi mahatā pariśrameṇa dravyam upārjitaṃ paripālitaṃ ca / tat putra mama priyam anusmaratā na tvayā kasmai kiṃ cid api pradeyam iti /

lg.l: caṇḍālaśālāṃ vrajata pragalbhān paśyāmi yuṣmān na punar yathāham /
kṛtvā sa karmāṇi nikṛṣṭakarmā mṛtas tapasvī mṛta eva pūrvam /
sattvānāṃ caritaṃ citram acintyā karmaṇāṃ gatiḥ /
andhā vṛddhā daridrā ca caṇḍālī dīrgharogiṇī /

body.p: atha sā vṛddhacaṇḍālī krameṇa dārakaṃ prasūtā / tasyā etad abhūt / nūnam ahaṃ devatābhir anukampitā yena me putrako jātaḥ / niyatam ayam āyuṣmān abhivardhamāno mamāndhāyā yaṣṭibhūto bhaviṣyatīti / sā praharṣākṣiptahṛdayā samīpaparivartanīṃ caṇḍālīm abravīt / jñāyatāṃ tāvad bhaginī kīdṛśo 'yaṃ dāraka iti / sā tam ālokyābravīt / īdṛśo mā bhūt kaś cid iti / kathaṃ katham iti ca / tatra paryanuyuktā provāca /

lg.l: andhaḥ saṃkucitāṅgaś ca tava putro 'yam īdṛśaḥ //

body.p:
sā nairāśyopahatasaṃtānā āha / hā hā hatāham adhanyety evaṃ paraṃ vaikalyam
ājagāma / āha ca /

lg.l: na tathānāgatāḥ pīḍāṃ kurvanty arthāḥ śarīriṇām /
saṃprāptā dhvaṃsamānās tu janayanti yathā vyathām //

body.p: atha sā jarjaracaṇḍālī vyasanavikṛtahṛdayā sasvaraṃ ruroda /

lg.l: kim iyaṃ mṛtamāritā kṛtā vidhinā niṣkaruṇena me punaḥ //
animittakhareva lakṣyate mayi daivasya gatir garīyasī //
aham eva khalūrikā kṛtā kṛpaṇā kiṃ nu vipattipattriṇā /
jaratīm upahatya ko guṇo vada māṃ nirghṛṇacitta daiva he //

body.p: evam anyathā ca sā tapasvinī bahuprakāraṃ viruroda /

lg.l: atha garbhamalopaliptadehaṃ tanayaṃ taṃ taruṇaṃ vraṇāyamānam /
kupiteva khare mahītale sā vinicikṣepa rujāhataṃ rudantam //
karmāṇi tīvraparitāpaphalāni kṛtvā kiṃ rodiṣi tvam adhunā hatabhāgadheya /
duḥkhaṃ mayā saha sahasva bahuprakāraṃ tvaṃ putraketi vilalāpa tapasvinī sā //
mithyāvikalpapariṇāmasukhānupātī sneho vivṛddhim upayāti sukhe sthitānām /
duḥkhopataptamanasāṃ śithilībhavanti pāśās tv amī priyavikalpamayā janānām //

body.p: atha sa tapasvī cāṇḍāladārako garbhamalākledopaliptabībhatsāśrayas tīvrāmagandhaḥ kṛmimakṣikāśatanipānabhūtaḥ pipīlakagaṇāhṛtakaṣṭāvispaṣṭaceṣṭakaracaraṇavadano māṃsapiṇḍa iva pratyagraḥ kṣititalopanikṣipto vāyasair apy abhibhūyamāno nāraka iva svakarmāvadhūtajīvitaśeṣaḥ paraṃ kṛcchram udvahati sma /

lg.l: tasya karmāparādhena mātuḥ stanyaṃ kṣayaṃ gatam /
ucitām api sā bhikṣāṃ na lebhe duḥkhabhāginī //
ācāmamātrām api nāma nāsau lebhe śunām apy anivāraṇīyām /
tasyaiva vā karmabhir ātmajasya svakarmabhir vā pariṇāmatiktaiḥ //

body.p: atha sa cāṇḍāladārako daivasāmārthyāt krameṇa yadā caṅkramaṇakṣamaḥ saṃvṛttas tadāsya mātrā daṇḍaḥ khaṇḍamallakaṃ cārpitaṃ gacchedānīm adhanyānubhavāśubhānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalavipākam iti / atha sa caṇḍālaśiśur bhikṣāhetoś candanasyaiva gṛham upajagāma /

adrākṣīc candanaḥ sārthavāhas taṃ cāṇḍālakumārakaṃ daṇḍakhaṇḍaśarāvavyagrahastaṃ lālājalapariklinnavadanaṃ bhinibhināyamānamakṣikāśatanipānabhūtam bāhyādhyātmikamalopahatagātraṃ rathyāreṇuvirūkṣitakatipayaśiroruhaṃ prakṛtikharadarbhasaṃstaraparivartanavilikhitatanum akṛtaśaucasaṃskāravidhānaṃ vikṛtanāsikābilāgalitasiṃhāṇakhaṇḍaparyavanaddhabībhatsānanaṃ vīthīmukhāt pravicitya dhānyapulākān romanthāyamānaṃ pūtanārūpam ivātivirūpaṃ mūrtimantaṃ saṃvegaṃ sākṣād iva pāpmānam alakṣmīpuñjam iva saṃpiṇḍitam apūrvam iva piśācanirmāṇaṃ vipākasarvasvam ivāśubhasya karmaṇaḥ samāhāram iva saṃsāraduḥkhānāṃ rāhumukhānyam iva jagaccakṣuṣāṃ rahasyabhūmim ivānādeyatāyā vigrahavantam iva paribhavam upanighātam iva nagarasya pratyādeśam ivāpakāriṇāṃ nilayam ivādhanyatāyāḥ padam iva daurbhāgyasya gṛhadvāraikadeśe niṣaṇṇaṃ daṇḍena kākān nivārayantam / dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ pūrvavairānuśayodbodhitakopa iva sarabhaso dauvārikam abravīt / are kāpuruṣa nirvāsayainam amaṅgalam alakṣmīkam aprekṣaṇīyaṃ caṇḍālādhamam / tathā cainaṃ nirbhartsaya yathā na punar ihāgacched iti /

lg.l: daṇḍena prerayām āsa paruṣāṃ giram udgiran //
yadi tvāṃ punar āyātam iha paśyāmi kaśmala /
na hi saṃkocam āyāti khalānāṃ kṛpaṇeṣv api //
papāta bhūmau kṛpaṇaḥ sa bālo daṇḍābhighātakṣatapṛṣṭhavaṃśaḥ /
prakāśayan karmaphalaṃ svam eva karmātiraudraṃ narakasya tasya //

body.p: atha sa tapasvī bhagnaśiraḥkapālabhāgo vikuñcitajānumaṇḍalaḥ pāṣāṇaśakalakapālaśarkarāparikṣatakṣāmajaṅghābāhudaṇḍakaḥ samantato vigalitarudhiradhārāvasicyamānavigraho mahīrajaḥkapālāvaruddhavadanavivaro vikṣiptadaṇḍakaḥ saṃcūrṇitamallako dharaṇitalavikīrṇabhikṣāśeṣas tīvravedanābhyāhataśarīro matsya iva prataptasikatāmadhyagataḥ saṃparivartate sma / athāsya mātā cintayām āsa / kiṃ nu me putrakaḥ prapāte patitaḥ syāc chunā vā bhakṣita uta gavā jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ paribhūya vā bāladārakair viheṭhito mārgapranaṣṭo vānyena pathā gataḥ / kiṃ vā nāgacchatīti sā putrasnehākṛṣṭahṛdayā putra putreti krandatī taṃ deśam upajagāma / sa ca bāladārako jananyāḥ svaraṃ pratyabhijñāya bhṛśataraṃ vicukrośa /

lg.l: putra ity eva niṣyandaḥ snehasyāsya duratyayaḥ //
ambeti dīnāṃ giram īrayantaṃ sā taṃ pariṣvajya tanupralāpam /
kasya putra dayā nāsīt tvayi duḥkhaikabhājane /
garvitaḥ ko nv asau lakṣmyā gajakarṇāgralolayā //
prakāśitam idaṃ kena kṛpaṇe tvayi pauruṣam /
tvayi praharataḥ kasya bhūmau na patitaḥ karaḥ //
hatas tvaṃ kena me vatsa niranukrośacetasā /
ko nv asau mānuṣākāro rakṣasām anuśikṣyate //
āyasaṃ hṛdayam kasya kasya vajramayaḥ karaḥ /
kasya vāk saviṣā kasya tvayi nāsīd dayālutā //
sa bālabhāvāt kṛpaṇo varākaḥ svabhyastamātsaryatayā tayā ca /
śuśoca bhaikṣaṃ kṣitiviprakīrṇaṃ na tu kṣaracchoṇitam ātmadeham //

body.p: atha vṛddhacaṇḍālī taṃ dārakaṃ kṣatavikṣataśarīraṃ śanaiḥ śanaiḥ pāṇinā parāmṛśantī provāca / kena te putrakeyam avasthā kṛtā nirdayena pāpakarmaṇā puruṣādhameneti / sa prāha / amba āryacandanena puruṣo 'bhihito nirvāsayainam amaṅgalam alakṣmīkam aprekṣaṇīyaṃ caṇḍālādhamam / tenāham evaṃ pīḍita iti / atha sā vṛddhacaṇḍālī dīrgham uṣṇaṃ viniśvasya pañcāṅgulam abhinipīḍayantī kopaparuṣākṣaram ity avocat /
evaṃ tasyāḥ śokavaśam upagatāyāḥ kṛpaṇāyāḥ samīpe mahājanakāyaḥ saṃnipatitaḥ / atrāntare

lg.l: ākṛṣyamāṇahṛdayaḥ kṛpayā mahatyā vaineyakṛtyam avalambya vināyakāgryaḥ /
prāvikṣad akṣatamanā bhagavān purīṃ tāṃ buddho vibuddhanavapaṅkajasaṃkrameṇa //
cāmīkarādrim iva jaṅgamam āpatantaṃ taṃ tāyinaṃ svakiraṇaiḥ pariviṣṭamūrtim /
paurāḥ prasādaśithilāvanataiḥ śirobhir dūrāt praṇemur upaśāntabhavaprapañcam //
sitabhavanagatās taṃ saṃbhramodbhrāntaceṣṭās taḍita iva sumeroḥ śṛṅgaparyantalagnāḥ /
upaśamam iva sākṣād āpatantaṃ taruṇyo maṇiguṇakusumaughair arcayām āsur āryam //
puṇyaprabhāvajanite bhagavān niṣadya padme sahasradalake rathacakramātre /
yenārjitaṃ dhanam idaṃ paripālitaṃ ca svedopadigdhavapuṣā kuṭukuñcakena /
nandaḥ pitā tava sa eva phalāni bhuṅkte tiktāni matsaraviṣadrumasaṃbhavāni //
sthānād itaḥ punar ayaṃ kaluṣāntarātmā yāsyaty apāyam anupāyabhayapratiṣṭham /
arciṣmatā hutabhujā vinikīrṇadehā yasmin vasanti vivaśā bahavaḥ kadaryāḥ //
etāṃ suhṛjjanaviṣādakarīm avasthām ālokya mohatamasaḥ pratibimbabhūtām /
svāṅgān nikṛtya piśitāny api ko na dadyāt saṃsāravartmani naraḥ parivartamānaḥ //
āyāsino yad anavāptajalā bhramanti pretāḥ phalaṃ tad api lobhaviṣadrumāṇām //
saṃśuṣkapaṅkapaṭalaprakarāntarālāṃ paśyanti ke cid analajvalitāṃ sravantīm //
dehān dahanti dahanā iva candrapādāḥ śītā raver api karā hi samudgiranti /
aṅgāracūrṇaparuṣāś ca bhavanty amīṣāṃ meghāmbuśīkaramuco 'pi kadambavātāḥ //
āśīviṣair iva nirīkṣitamātraśobhāḥ pretair drumā vimalanīlacalatpalāśāḥ /
sadyo bhavanti pariśuṣkaviśīrṇaparṇāḥ pratyādiśanta iva matsariṇo manuṣyān //
pretopapattiniyatā vyasanābhighātā vyaktībhavanti manujeṣv api naikarūpāḥ /
pañcopatāpavirasākṣaram apragalbhaṃ dehīti yad vadati durbalamandamandam /
vittāvaliptamanasaḥ kulajo 'pi sādhuḥ sā nīcatā vibhavalobhaparājitānām //
āśāvighātabhayasaṃkucitaś ca dīno dehīty api prasahate kṛpaṇo na vaktum /
yan nirdhano dhanavataḥ puruṣān akāle maunavrataṃ tad api lobhakṛtaṃ narāṇām //
na janasya malo 'sti lobhatulyo na ca mātsaryasamaḥ paropaghātaḥ /
na ca yācakatulyam asti mitraṃ jagatāṃ tyāgasamo na bandhur anyaḥ //
anuyānti janaṃ pradānaśīlaṃ javinaś cāmariṇaś ca vājimukhyāḥ //
upayānti narasya dāsabhāvaṃ kuśalair eva vaśīkṛtāḥ purāṇaiḥ //
gatalobhamalasya tā narāṇāṃ dyutayas tyāganiśākarasya ramyāḥ //
viśadāgalitaiḥ śiromaṇīnāṃ kiraṇair yac chalayanti pādapīṭham /
nṛpater anujīvino vinītā madhuraṃ tyāgavanaspateḥ phalaṃ tat //
kṛpaṇāsu bavopabhogamātrāsv atha vā kaiva kathā vināśinīṣu /
niravadyasukhānubandhi ramyaṃ phalam āpnoti sanātanaṃ pradānāt //
avadhūya balaṃ śamadviṣāṃ yaj jaladānām iva maṇḍalaṃ nabhasvān /
padam avyayam āpnuvanti buddhā bhagavantas tad api pradānabijam //
abhibhūya parapravādipūgān paramārthaṃ gamayanti śāsanaṃ svam /

body.p: atha bhagavān pātrīkṛtādhyāśayaṃ taṃ janam avetya ratnatrayāvicalitaprasādaṃ saṃsāravāsavimukhaṃ bhavaduḥkhopaśamapratisaṃyuktām eva kathāṃ āviś cakāra /

lg.l: duḥkhāny amūni sati janmani saṃbhavanti kṣīṇe ca janmani na duḥkham upaiti bhūyaḥ /
janmakṣayāya matimān prayateta tasmād yaḥ prāptum icchati na duḥkhaśatābhighātam //
eṣo 'ham ity ucita eva manovidāhī satkāyadarśanamayaḥ puruṣasya kīlaḥ /
janmādhvani bhramayatīdam anādimadhyaṃ saṃsāracakram aparigraham apraśāntam //

body.p:
sthitvā śīle vigatarajasi prāpya cetaḥ samādhiṃ
prajñālokair manasi śayitaṃ dhvāntam ullikhya kṛtsnam /

lg.l: prajñālokair manasi śayitaṃ dhvāntam ullikhya kṛtsnam /
saṃśāntātmā na divi bhuvi vā bhikṣur āyāti saṃkhyam //

body.p:
yair nirdagdhā matihutabhujā skandhasaṃbandhalakṣyī
tṛṣṇā naikavyasanaviśikhāpātasaṃdhānamaurvī /

lg.l: te 'smin dhanyā jagati sukhinas te ta evānavadyās
teṣāṃ bhadraṃ sthitam abhimukhaṃ te bhayebhyo vimuktāḥ //

body.p:
riktākāradravaratirasāsvādaparyastabuddher
leśanāpi vyanusṛtavato jālinīṃ citramāyām /

lg.l: āyāsinīṃ bhavavibhūtim avāptukāmaiḥ śāntiṃ parāṃ ca parataḥ kuśalaṃ praceyam /
āśīviṣo narapater nidhanāya mukto hāro babhūva kuśalaiḥ sphuṭacandragauraḥ //

body.p: kiṃ ca bhūyaḥ

lg.l: duḥkhadviṣā hṛdi na lobhakalir niṣevyo janmāntaropacitalobhaviṣāśayasya /
śāntātmano 'pi kila nirvivaraṃ babhūva bhaktābhihārasamaye mukham eva bhikṣoḥ //
tasmāt pradānasalilaiḥ snapayantu santo mātsaryapaṅkamalināni manogṛhāṇi /
lobhānalendhanam idaṃ nidhanaṃ dhanaṃ vo yāvan na yāti vipadagniśikhāvalīḍham //
śrutvā vacāṃsi sa jano jagadekabandhor nandasya tāṃ ca vipadaṃ vipulām udīkṣya /
vikṣipya matsaramayīṃ manasas tamisrāṃ dānādikaṃ sucaritaṃ prathayāṃ babhūva //

body.p: iti matsaranandāvadānam //

8. Megha
tadyathānuśrūyate
bodhisattvaḥ kila bhagavān prakṛtidakṣiṇo dakṣiṇāpathe rājā babhūva //

lg.l: saṃtarpayām āsa yataḥ sa lokaṃ dānāmbubhiḥ sasyam ivāmbugarbhaḥ /
tato mahāmegha iti kṣitīśo yathārthanāmātiśayo babhūva //
na tasya rājyadyutivistareṣu vyāsaktadīnaṃ hṛdayaṃ babhūva /
anarthabhūtān sa parārtham arthān drumaḥ phalānīva babhāra sādhuḥ //
suteṣv iva premanibaddhabhāvo babhūva so 'pi kṣitipaḥ prajāsu //
kṛtāparādheṣv api maitracittaḥ samantabhadras tu suhṛjjaneṣu //
babhūva tasya graharājakīrtes tathāgraho na svaparigraheṣu /
yathā tadīyāsu mamatvam āsīj janasya saṃpatsv atiśāyinīṣu //
jagrāha dānena sa kāṃś cid eva priyābhidhānair aparān vicitraiḥ /

body.p:
naivāsau svaṃ parahitapratipatprakāro
yan nātmasāc ca naralokapatiś cakāra /

lg.l: ko 'pi tv asau katham api dyutimān kuto 'pi

body.p: sa kadā cin mahīpatir amātyagaṇapuraskṛta udaṅmukho dadarśātasīkusumarāśisaṃkāśam ākāśam avagāhya patato bhagavataḥ pratyekabuddhān paramavismitamanā hy amātyān abravīt // paśyantu bhavantaḥ //

lg.l: āyānti ke 'py upaśamastimitapracārā bhūrjadrumā iva marudbhir udastamūlāḥ //

body.p: anyatamo 'py amātyaḥ sasaṃbhramo 'bravīt // samyag abhihitaṃ devena kutaḥ //
aparo 'py āha //

anupatati na caitān abhramālī nabhasvān
upaśamaramaṇīye cāpatanti prakṛtyā /

lg.l: yathā yathā te nikaṭī bhavanti vratīśvarāḥ śāntim ivākirantaḥ /
tathā tathā vismayaharṣapūrṇā rājanvatī sā samitiś cakampe //
atṛptā eva te teṣāṃ darśanena mahātmanāṃ /

body.p: atha sa pārthivas teṣāṃ maharṣīṇāṃ darśanenāvarjitamanās tān amātyān abravīt //

lg.l: mano mama tad icchāmi śrotum eṣāṃ pravistaraṃ //

body.p: atha teṣāṃ nṛpatisacivānām abhijñātataro 'mātyas taṃ rājānam abravīt // śrūyatāṃ mahārāja //

lg.l: ātmānam ekaṃ praty ete buddhā yasmād ataḥ kila /

body.p: atha sa rājā sutarāṃ tadguṇākṛṣṭahṛdayaḥ sa tam amātyam abravīt // atha kutrāmī bhagavantaḥ prativasantīti // sa prāha //

lg.l: meghasya rājño vijite jitātman vasanty amī dagdhabhavādhivāsāḥ /

body.p: rājovāca // asti kaś cid upāyo yenāmī madviṣayāntam āvaseyur ity amātyo 'bravīt // asti mahārāja yadi megharājā prārthyate tadanvabhyarthitāḥ kilāmī tvadviṣayam alaṃ kurvantyaḥ prāpnuvanti ceti // atha bodhisattvaḥ puṇyeṣv ādaropadarśanārtham amātyān āha // tena hi bhavantaḥ sajjīkuruta // tadanurūpamānapātraṃ svayam evāhaṃ gatvā meghaṃ rājānam asminn arthe vijñāpayiṣyāmīty adhvasaṃbhrāntās te puruṣā bodhisattvam āhuḥ // nārhati devo dūtamātrasādhye prayojane khedam āpattum // api ca mahārāja //

lg.l: pararāṣṭram ato gantuṃ sahasā tava na kṣamaṃ //

body.p: bodhisattvo 'bravīt //

lg.l: ātmatvenaiva yair eva tad upāttaṃ bhavatrayaṃ /
nāsmād gurutaraṃ cāsti karaṇīyaṃ mama paraṃ //
na cājñārabhasārambhe na rājyabhāraṃ vahāmy ahaṃ /
jagatāṃ vayam eveha kṛpayā kiṃkarāḥ kṛtāḥ //
audāsīnyaṃ kathaṃ nāma kuryāt tatraiva paṇḍitaḥ //

body.p: api ca bhadantaḥ //

lg.l: vinā śramais tuccham asāram adhruvaṃ sukhaṃ na kāmāśrayam apy avāpyate /
niveśya kāmeṣu caleṣu mānasaṃ mudhaiva khinnā vayam anyajanmasu /
jagaddhitāya tv adhunābhivāñchitā bhavantu nas tv antakarāḥ pariśramāḥ //
kathaṃ nu tasmin na yateta buddhimān nibadhya yasminn abhilāṣamātrakaṃ /
asaṃstutānām api caikabandhutāṃ jano janānām upayāti tatkṣaṇāt //

body.p: tadatyayāśaṅkibhiś cāmātyaiḥ sa mahātmā punaḥ punaḥ pratibodhyamāno 'pi naiva teṣāṃ vacanaṃ pramāṇayām āsa //

lg.l: tyaktaspṛhatvāt kṣitipasya tasya sarvatra kāruṇyamayī pravṛttiḥ /
guṇānurāgāt sa tathāpi teṣāṃ pūjāṃ munīnāṃ prati sādaro 'bhūt //
ya eva ratnātiśayāntarajñās ta eva teṣv atyadhikaṃ yatante //
kṛpālukas tv arthitayaiva tuṣṭaḥ pravartate yācanakeṣu sāraṃ //
labheta teṣāṃ hṛdaye 'vakāśaṃ khalā phalāśā viduṣāṃ kathaṃ ca //

body.p: atha sa mahāsattvo guṇānuvṛttisthirānurāgeṇa mahatā balena parivṛtaḥ svapuravarād viniryayau // nirgacchantaṃ cainaṃ dūrvāpravālakusumaphalavyagrātyucchritaikapāṇayo dvijavarā jaya jaya mahārājety uccair ānandayām āsuḥ // atha sa mahātmā laukikamaṅgalāpariniṣpattim abhiprakāśayan buddhānām eva ca bhagavatāṃ guṇānuvādaṃ maṅgalaṃ codbhāvayan vyāpinā svareṇa tān amaṅgale maṅgalābhiniveśino viprān abravīt //

durbhedaṃ yo bibheda pravicayakiraṇair dhvāntam antarniviṣṭaṃ
tṛṣṇāvallīṃ samūlāṃ bhavataruśikharārohinīṃ yo dadāha /

lg.l: āgṛhya krodhasarpaṃ hṛdayabilatalāt ko 'pi cikṣepa yo 'sau

body.p:
aśrāntaṃ suvidūragocaracaraṃ durnigrahaṃ durgrahaṃ
duṣpūraṃ viṣayābhilāṣakṛpaṇaṃ māyāsvabhāvaṃ calaṃ /

lg.l: yaś cittaṃ damayāṃ babhūva sa jayatv avyagracetā muniḥ //

body.p:
antardyotir apāsya yasya tamasām āyāminīṃ vāsanām
akliṣṭām api nirdadhāva nivṛtiṃ kālatrayavyāpinīṃ /

lg.l: prajñānaṃ bhagavān asau vijayate buddho jagacchaṅkaraḥ //

body.p: sa krameṇa vyatītya tālahiṃtālatamālanaktamālaniculabakulakānanopaśobhitaṃ svaviṣayam khadirabadarabilveṅgudaśamīpalāśagahanadurgām aṭavīṃ prapede // tasya khalu mahāsattvasya puṇyatarṣeṇa drutataraṃ vrajataḥ //

lg.l: niruddhaṃ khaṃ reje pulinam iva paryastam udadheḥ /

body.p: so 'tikramya tām aṭavīm anukrameṇa meghasya rājño viṣayam anuprāptaḥ / tadāgamanasaṃbhrāntaś ca megho mahīpatir viditatadguṇaprabhāvaḥ pratyudgamyainaṃ sabahumānapraharṣavismayavikacalocano mahatā satkāreṇa mānayitvā mahārhāsanopaviṣṭaṃ tat tat priyam avocat //

lg.l: subhāṣitam idaṃ loke jīvan bhadrāṇi paśyasi //
sākṣād vo darśanaṃ yat tu tan maṅgalyaphalodayaṃ //
svapno 'yam uta māyeti niścayaṃ na labhāmahe /
kac cid aklāntakāyas tvaṃ rājan kac cid anāmayaḥ /
anapāyī bhavet kac cid ayatnaḥ satsamāgamaḥ /
kac cid atrābhiramase svadeśa iva bhūpate //

body.p: atha bodhisattvas taṃ rājānam amlānapraṇayaśībharair vacobhiḥ samuttejayann abravīt //

lg.l: anāryasyāpi viśrambhaḥ kasya na syād bhavādṛśe //
prasaṅgaṃ matimān kuryān na priyapraṇayeṣv ataḥ //
priyo mamety evam anādikālapravṛttam udvṛttam analpagarbhaṃ /
sukhābhidhānaṃ pravadanti duḥkhaṃ vyatītaduḥkhā munayaḥ purāṇāḥ //
kṛpā kṛpāvastuṣu saṃpratāryate striyaḥ kṛpāvastu viśeṣataḥ satāṃ /
ato matir me karuṇānupātinī priyāsu rājan na tu vibhramāturā //
pathi prakīrṇā iva māṃsapeśikāḥ kathaṃ nu na syuḥ pramadāḥ kṛpāspadaṃ //

body.p: atha sa rājā prasāditamānasas tair bodhisattvavacanakusumaiḥ praṇamyainam abravīt //

lg.l: ājñāpaya mahārāja yatra māṃ manyase kṣamaṃ /

body.p: prasannamānasaṃ sa cainam avetya bodhisattvaḥ saṃpraharṣayann abravīt //

lg.l: tavaiva saphalaṃ janma sujīvaṃ tvaṃ ca jīvasi /
aiśvaryaṃ tava pātrasthaṃ yathārthā śrīs tavaiva ca //
suhṛdaḥ saṃvibhajyante dārair api dhanair api /
saṃvibhāgas tu dharmeṇa durlabho bhuvi nāsti vā //
dharmātithyam ato rājan mama tvaṃ kartum arhasi /
na hi saṃbhāvanā satsu dṛṣṭā vandhyaphalodayā //
svargo mokṣaḥ sukhāny arthā dharmād eva yaśāṃsi ca /
eṣaiva suhṛdāṃ loke sādhoḥ sādhīyasī sthitiḥ //
mayi caitat trayaṃ yasmād ato me 'bhyarthanāṃ kuru //
sravann iva prasādas te lakṣyate mukhapaṅkajāt /

body.p: athāsau mahīpatir bodhisattvam abravīt //

lg.l: śakye tat kuśalaṃ dātuṃ svasaṃtānagataṃ yadi /
dadyāṃ tad api suvyaktaṃ bhavate kṛtavedine //
vayaṃ rājyaṃ ca dātāro yad vānyat sādhu manyase /
mayā yat puṇyam āryāṇām eṣām apaciteś citaṃ /
guṇavān dakṣiṇīyas tvaṃ nāthaś cānuttaro mama //
draṣṭavyaratnaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca na prasīded bhavādṛśaṃ //

body.p: ekaṃ tv atra mahārāja vaidhuram avagacchāmi / yena me vaktum asty etān maharṣīn asmin prayojane saṃkucati mānasam // ete hi mahātmāno vivekaratipriyatvād abhiramante himavati śailarāje // paśya mahārāja //

lg.l: imā himādre ramayanti mānasaṃ nivṛttasaṃrāgaviṣaṃ vipaścitāṃ //
vanāni cetaḥsthitim āpnuvanty amī sumedhasaḥ kāmavivekapeśalāṃ //

body.p: bodhisattvaḥ provāca //

lg.l: aviralaparipāto 'bhyāsayogānupātī sthirayati kila bhikṣos tatra cetaḥsamādhiṃ //

body.p:
nirdhautopalasānur añjanaśilānīlaiḥ payodher jalair
vātāyāsitacandanadrumalatāvikṣiptasūryātapaḥ /

citrotsaṅgo viṣamanicitair dhātupāṣāṇakhaṇḍaiḥ
śaṣpodbhedais taruṇataruṇaiḥ śyāmaparyantalekhaḥ /

sahyādrer vilasattamālaharitāḥ prasthāḥ prahāṇakṣamā
niḥśabdākṣaradacchanirjharajalaprakṣālitaprastarāḥ /

tīrāntānatabālavetasataruśreṇīniruddhātapā
nadyaḥ svacchajalāntarālavilasanmīnāvalīmekhalāḥ /

lg.l: sakhyaḥ premaniratyayā iva sakhe tatrāpy alaṃ yoginām

body.p: api ca mahārāja //

lg.l: yeṣām asmīty ayam apagataś cetaso vipralambho
ye paśyanti vyasanadahanair ā bhavāgrāt pradīptaṃ
lokaṃ teṣāṃ na bhavati mano lokacitrānupāti //

body.p:
nityasrāviṇam agnimadhyanihitaṃ kumbhaṃ yathā medasāṃ
ye lokārtham anarthabhāravirasaṃ santo vahanty āśrayaṃ /

lg.l: ye lokārtham anarthabhāravirasaṃ santo vahanty āśrayaṃ /
āvir bhavanti tanavo 'pi paropakārā yasmiṃs tad eva ramaṇīyam upaiti sādhuḥ /
duḥkheṣv anātmasu caleṣv aparāyaṇeṣu kiṃ vā bhaveṣu ratikāraṇam asti rājan //
svārthānurāgakṛpaṇā matayo narāṇāṃ tucche 'pi vastuni ratiṃ parikalpayanti /
utpāda eva mahatāṃ hi jagaddhitāya yeṣāṃ purandarapure 'pi na te ramante //
ramayanty anuddhṛtavikalpasāyakān saritaḥ sarāṃsi girayo vanāni ca /
avikalpagocaravicāriṇo yater vanam eva śāntam iti niścitā matiḥ //
adhicittayogaviduṣāṃ tu yogināṃ atimānuṣe carati gocare matiḥ //
rajasāṃ vipūyapariṇāhimaṇḍalaṃ paramām avāpya vaśitāṃ svacetasi /
anapāyinīm anubhavanti ye ratiṃ bhavanaṃ vanaṃ ca samam eva tān prati //
viṣayāntarāntaritavibhramaṃ manaḥ praśame rameta katham ity ato yateḥ /
upadiśyate vanatarupratiśrayo mahatāṃ samaṃ tu viṣayaṃ manaḥsukhaṃ //
ramaṇīyam etad iti vikṛtaṃ mateḥ pravadanty avandhyavacasaḥ purātanāḥ /
kṛtināṃ mano hatavikalpavāsanaṃ na samādhijeṣv api sukheṣu rajyate //
jagatāṃ hiteṣu caratāṃ mahīpate karuṇaikatānamanasāṃ manasvinām /
bhavati vyathātanupariśramais tanor na ca kāyajīvitanikāntividviṣām //
gaganopamānamanasāṃ spṛśanty amī na manaḥ sukhārativikalpareṇavaḥ /
sukham anyad eva tad apākṛtopamaṃ yad upāsate sukṛtino raṇaṃjahāḥ //
vratinām adūraparisarpiṇī manaḥsthitir eva nāma jananīva vatsalā /
sukham ādadhāti tad atītamānuṣaṃ na marutpater api yad asti vajriṇaḥ //
sukhaduḥkhayor aviṣamapravṛttayo nṛpa yena tena parituṣṭamānasāḥ /
satataṃ mṛgā iva nisargatāpasā viharanty anāvṛtavihāragocarāḥ //
upahātya ye padam upāsate śivaṃ tridive 'pi te narakavāsasaṃjñinaḥ //
anubandhiniṃ pratinivārya saṃhatiṃ tamasāṃ kim apy anubhavanti ye sukhaṃ /
na sanatkumārabhavane 'pi te ratiṃ viratopasargaratayaḥ prakurvate //
saritaś ca haṃsakulabhinnavīcayaḥ paridurbale manasi labdhapravṛttayaḥ //
sādhu sādhv iti saṃrādhya pratijagrāha tadvacaḥ //
vākyaṃ suhṛjjanamukhoccaritaṃ kathaṃ na syād apratigrahavipātitakāntiśobhaṃ //
vākyāni sajjanamukhāmburuhacyutāni pradveṣarūkṣam api mānasam ākṣipanti //
nīceṣv api praṇatinamraśirodharāṇāṃ krūrāśayeṣv api kṛpāmṛdumānasānāṃ /
ādyantamadhyamadhurāṇi jinātmajānāṃ vākyāni ko bhuve vimānayituṃ samarthaḥ //

body.p:
tān abhyarthya sa pārthivo bhagavataḥ pratyekabuddhān atha
prītyutkarṣaparamparām anubhavan kām apy anāyāsinīṃ /

lg.l: āvāsaṃ svam upohya saugatabhavās te 'pi kṣaṇenāyayuḥ
svarddhyaivāpratighaṃ vigāhya vighanaṃ khaṃ rājahaṃsā iva //
sa bhūpatiḥ ṣaṣṭisahasrasaṃkhyā guhā viviktā jalayaṃtraśītāḥ /
saṃskārya tebhyaḥ pradadau prasannaḥ pratyekaśo dagdhapunarbhavebhyaḥ //
śaratsahasrāṇi saṣaṣṭir eva cakāra teṣāṃ vigatajvarāṇāṃ /
taṃ bodhau sa pariṇamayya puṇyarāśiṃ saṃtyajya prakṛtivināśinaṃ svadehaṃ /

body.p:
puṇyāny evam asau cakāra bhagavān yasmāj jagadbhūtaye
tyaktvā rājyavibhūtivistarasukhāny amlāyamānodyamaḥ /

lg.l: tasmāt tatra manaḥ prasādya bhagavaty āścaryaratnākare

9. Nāga

lg.l: sādhavaḥ sādhumaryādāṃ na muhūrtam api kṣamāḥ //

body.p: tad yathānuśrūyate/
bodhisattvabhūtaḥ kilāhaṃ bhagavān aparimlāyamānakaruṇāsaumyadarśano nāgarājo babhūva /

lg.l: krodhena tasya saha śāśvatasaṃvirodhaḥ krodhottaraṃ nigaditaṃ samupāgatasya /
icchānukūlamadhurā pratisandhilīlā sādhoḥ suyonividhuraiva babhūva tasya //
saṃprāptakarmavaśitātiśayasya yasya lokā hṛdīva nivasanti kṛpāviśāle /
roṣas tataḥ katham uderati śuddhasattvāt padmākarād vikasitād iva citrabhānuḥ //

body.p: atha sa mahāsattvaḥ krodhabahulatāṃ nāgayoner avetya tatpratipakṣakṣamākathām udbhāvayām āsa svaparṣadi //

lg.l: na hemamālā maṇidīptiśībharāḥ srajo na citrā makarandapiñjarāḥ /
tathābhyalaṃkartum alaṃ śarīriṇāṃ yathā kṣamā sarvaguṇaikaratnakā //
manojñarūpā api nāma roṣiṇo viṣādayanty eva manāṃsi dehinām /
asaṃstutānām api nāma sūratā bhavanti viśrambhaviśeṣabhājanam /
iti kṣamāṃ ko na bhajeta buddhimān aśeṣalokāśrayasaṃgrahakṣamām //
imām avasthāṃ gamitā vidāhināmunā vayaṃ roṣamayena pāpmanā /
nivṛttavairān api yad viśaṅkate mahājano 'smān animittakāhataḥ //

body.p: evam anyathā ca svayūthyān saṃjñāpayām āsa // api ca //

lg.l: tesāṃ sa pannagavaraḥ śamayāṃ babhūva vāgambubhiś ca hṛdayāni bhujaṅgamānām //

body.p: sa ca mahātmājanmāntarābhyastapraśamarativihārasādhanaḥ sarvalokottarotkṛṣṭair tair api viṣayair anākalitamānaso viḍambanām iva tām aiśvaryalakṣmīm abhimanyamānaḥ pravivekasukhavihāroparodhinaṃ cādhipatyapariśramam āryanyāyamārgakaṇṭakasthānīyāṃś ca snigdhajanasamāgamān prakṛtidhīramānasaḥ san gṛhe 'py araṇyasaṃjñābhāvanāsamarthaḥ saśaṅko gārhasthadoṣam evodbhāvayan svabhavanād abhyudgamya vivikteṣv araṇyāyataneṣu poṣadhaniyamālaṃkṛtaśarīraḥ kālam atināmayām āsa //

lg.l: tyaktvā gehaṃ vibhavakalilaṃ ye vivikte vasanti
prāyas teṣu praśamavimukho vismayaṃ yāti lokaḥ /
citraṃ manye kṣaṇam api gṛhe yad ramante vidagdhā

body.p: atha kadā cit sa mahātmā pratyaraṇyaniviṣṭataruṇatarumaṇḍalaikadeśāvasthito bhujagaviṣopaghātayogyavidyādhareṇa brāhmaṇenopalakṣitaḥ / sa tasya tena niyamaviśeṣaramaṇīyenāśvāsadena tejasvibhāvena vismitamanā nāsmāt pratyavāyo 'stīti niścitya svajīvikopāyaṃ ca tadgrahaṇasāhasam avetya taṃ bhujagapatiṃ viśrambhamukulitaphaṇacakram āsīnaṃ sahasā mahatā daṇḍena śirasy abhijaghāna taptapāṃsupūgaiś cāsya nayanāni pūrayām āsa mahatyā cainaṃ vararajjvā gāḍhaṃ grīvāyām āmardayāṃ babhūva mūlāgadasaṃmiśreṇa cainaṃ śleṣmaṇā vadanavivareṣu saṃsiktavān vivṛtya cāsya vadanapuṭam ayaḥsaṃdaṃśena daṃṣṭrāḥ samudājahāra // lobhaparyākulamānasaś cāsya tīkṣṇena śastreṇa ghanakośopagūḍhamūlāṃ cūḍāmaṇim utpāṭayāṃ cakre pratinakulacalavalayarāśikomale cāsya bhogakuṇḍale bimbopadhāna iva niṣadya viśaśrāma //

yo bibhran dayitājanena racitāṃ kaṇṭheguṇāṃ komalāṃ
khedaṃ nāgavaraḥ sukhocitamayāṃ [?] bheje kriyāṃ cāyatām [?] /

lg.l: khedaṃ nāgavaraḥ sukhocitamayāṃ [?] bheje kriyāṃ cāyatām [?] /
rajjvā karkaśapāśayā paśur iva grīvopabaddho bhṛśaṃ

body.p:
yaṃ pratyagratamālacandanarasapraśleṣaśītaiḥ karair
grīṣme prāṇasamāḥ saratnavalayair nāgottamaṃ paspṛśuḥ /

lg.l: daṃṣṭrā bisāṅkurasitā vinigūḍhamūlās tasyoccakhāna sa yadā bhujageśvarasya /
śalyāpahāriṇi tadā bhiṣajīva tasmin vipre cakāra sa parām upakārisaṃjñām //
ārtīyate sma sahajāny api yāni citraṃ sādhuḥ śiromaṇimayāni vibhūṣaṇāni /
śvāsānilaiḥ sphuṭaviṣāgnikarākarālair ucchoṣayet samakarān api yaḥ samudrān /
kṣāntiṃ priyām iva sakhīm upaguhya tasthau svasthas tam eva ca ripuṃ karuṇāyamānaḥ //
syād bhasmasāc chikharakoṭivipāṭitābhraḥ śailo 'pi dṛṣṭiviṣayaṃ samupetya yasya /
pāpātmanā kumudanālam ivoragendro nāsau cukopamṛdito 'pi parānurakṣī //
tīvraprakāram upakāram ivāvikāraḥ sehe kṛpāparigataḥ sa yathā yathāryaḥ /
krauryāvalepaparuṣaḥ sa tathā tathā taṃ cikleśa pannagavaraṃ vividhair upāyaiḥ //
karuṇādravam eva durjanaḥ sutarāṃ satpuruṣaṃ prabādhate /
mṛdam eva bhinatti kaṇṭakaḥ kaṭhine kuṇṭhaka eva jāyate //
sa pīḍyamānaḥ puruṣeṇa tena bhujaṅgarājo vigatavyathena /
tam eva rakṣan guṇapakṣasākṣī mumoca na śvāsaviṣaṃ viṣādī //
yathā yathā pīḍayati sma nāma tam āryakarmāṇam asāv anāryaḥ /
tathā tathāsau tadapāyaśaṅkī na cakṣur unmīlayituṃ viṣehe //
kṣamāśilādhāraparigrahasthiraṃ na kampayanti sma mano manasvinaḥ //
netropaghātapaṭunā paṭunā vimuktaṃ tasmin babhūva sutarāṃ sa parānukampaḥ //

body.p:
yaḥ snāto jalayantramandiragato rājā jalaiḥ śītalair
nānāpuṣparajo'dhivāsaśucibhiś candraprabhānirmalaiḥ /

lg.l: siktaḥ śleṣmalavair anāryamatinā durgandhibhis tena saḥ

body.p: evam anyathā cāsau brāhmaṇādhamas taṃ bodhisattvam parikliśya mahati karaṇḍe prakṣipya tena tena paribhraman vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm anuprāptaḥ // atha tasya bhujagapates tāṃ rūpasaṃpadam ālokya mahājanaḥ paramavismitamanās taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ mahatyā pūjayā pūjayām āsa //

atha tasya mahātmanaḥ sumanānāmāntaḥpurāgracarā bhujagayoṣid atītāyām ucitāyāṃ tadāgamanavelāyāṃ taṃ bhogipatim apaśyantī jānānā tasya prakṛtibhadratām anāryakarmārāmatāṃ ca mānuṣahṛdayānāṃ tadatyayāśaṅkinī tīvraśokāyāsavyathitahṛdayā tat tad vikalpya satvaraṃ ruroda //

lg.l: tamasā nirantaravisāriṇaiva me parivaryate nayanagocaraṃ balāt /
anirūpitātyayavikalpakātaraṃ dravatīva mānasam idaṃ priyaṃ vinā //
sutarāṃ dahanti mama calamārutā dayitapravāsaparitāpinīṃ tanum //
pratibhāty apūrvam iva sarvam adya me na ca vedmi kāham iti tena varjitā /
vyasane sa eva śaraṇaṃ mama priyo virahe tu tasya maraṇaṃ parāyaṇam //
maṇivedikākiraṇapāṭalormayo gṛhadīrghikā na ramayanti me manaḥ /
diśatūttamāni jagaduttamadyutir mama maṅgalāni bhagavān sa eva tu /
na bhavāntare 'pi viraho yathā bhaved dayitena tena niravadyakarmaṇā //
iti yaj jagāda manaso 'tivallabhaḥ samupasthitaṃ tad idam adya vaiśasam //
tanum utsṛjāmi śikharād girer imām avaśiṣyate kim aparaṃ mamāyuṣaḥ //
yadi so 'dya naiti sukhasaumyadarśano mama mūrtimān avikalo manorathaḥ /
svayam eva dhakṣyati mamedam āśrayaṃ hṛdayajvalas tumulaśokadāruṇaḥ //
iti sā rurāva kurarīva viklavā nayanāmbudurdinamukhī tapasvinī /

body.p: atha sumanā nāma yoṣid bodhisattvam anveṣamānā vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm anuprāptā dadarśa cainaṃ mahāsattvaṃ paramadāruṇām avasthām upagataṃ dṛṣṭvā ca tīvraśokāyāsavyathitahṛdayā provāca /

lg.l: kva dayita gatās tās tā daṃṣṭrā bisāṅkuradhūsarāḥ /

body.p:
kiṃ dharmo 'stam itaḥ prajāhitakaraḥ kiṃ lokapālā mṛtāḥ
tejaḥ kopaviṣātisaṅgarabhasaṃ kiṃ proṣitaṃ bhoginām /

lg.l: śūnyaṃ kiṃ nu patiprabhābhir adhunā niḥśuklamūlaṃ jagad
yena tvaṃ vyasanaṃ duruttaram idaṃ prāpto vināśāya te //

body.p:
nāsīt kasya dayā tvayi praharato 'nāryasya śāntātmani
krauryaṃ tvayy api nāma sādhucarite pāpātmanāṃ jāyate /

lg.l: krauryaṃ tvayy api nāma sādhucarite pāpātmanāṃ jāyate /
tvām āyāsayataḥ kathaṃ na patitau tasya prakoṣṭhāt karau
nāthānātha ivāpadaṃ katham imāṃ prāptas tvam āyāsinīm //

body.p: bodhisattvas tu pratyagrakopaśokakaluṣitādhyāśayātmanām avetya tūṣṇīm eva babhūva // sā punar abravīt //

lg.l: kasyāpriyaṃ jīvitam ādyajātaṃ kālena kelīṃ saha kaḥ karoti /

body.p:
udadhiparikhām adyaivaināṃ dahāmi vasundharāṃ
sanaganagaragrāmārāmāṃ svadṛṣṭihutāśanaiḥ /

lg.l: na mama hṛdayaṃ śāntiṃ yāti tvadapriyatāḍitaṃ
dahati yadi na krodhāgnir māṃ purā niravagrahaḥ //

body.p: atha bodhisattvas tāṃ tapasvinīm aviṣahyakopāgnipradīptamānasāṃ hlādayann iva tadāmṛtaśiśirābhir vāgbhir ity abravīt //

lg.l: alam alaṃ mā gā bhadre vai kopasya cetovidāhinaḥ /
prakṛtiduḥkheṣu ko bhūyaḥ sattveṣu duḥkhāni cintayet //

body.p: duḥkhahetau vartamāneṣu śocyeṣu saṃkleśabhāgiṣu kaḥ parākramet // duḥkhāya svahitakramārteṣu dehiṣu na mama daṃṣṭrotpāṭanād duḥkhaṃ na ca daṇḍasaṃpātajā rujāḥ // duḥkhayanti mānasaṃ caṇḍi tvadvākkarkaśās tudanti mām // api ca kānte //

lg.l: kopavahnimlāyamānā punaḥ saiva tvam anyeva lakṣyase //

body.p: kiṃ ca //

lg.l: karmāparādhajanitaṃ yadi duḥkham etat kopāvakāśa iha ko nu mama dvijātau /
karmendhanoddhataśikhāśakalākulebhyaḥ kupyet kathaṃ na matimān narakānalebhyaḥ //
svagṛhān eva gacchasva saṃtyāgaṃ ca kuruṣva me //

body.p: sā bhartur abhiprāyaṃ saṃpādayantī tadvacanāpyāyitahṛdayā vigatakopasaṃrambhā babhūva //

lg.l: kopoparāgavigame vivṛto 'dhimātraḥ snehaḥ priye viṣamavartini nāgavadhvā /
udghāṭitābhrapaṭalasphuṭadigvibhāge khe niḥsapatna iva candramasaḥ prakāśaḥ //

body.p: śokāśrunayanapariplutā ceti bodhisattvam abravīt //

lg.l: kuto me duḥkhabhāginyā gehaṃ ārya tvayā vinā /
ihaiva śoṣam eṣyāmi yā gatis tava sā mama //
kānta kena sukhenāhaṃ drakṣyāmi svajanaṃ punaḥ //
sukhe samānatāṃ gatvā duḥkhe jahyāṃ yadi priyam /
anāryām akṛtajñāṃ māṃ dhārayiṣyati bhūḥ katham //
pratibhāti jagac chūnyaṃ tvayā virahitaṃ mama /
tvaṃ me jīvitasarvasvaṃ tvaṃ bandhus tvaṃ parāyaṇam //
parikleśam imaṃ soḍhum akṣamā tvam anindite //
mayi sneho 'sti yadi te duḥkhaṃ me yadi necchasi /
adṛṣṭam adya māṃ kṛtvā tad gaccha tvaṃ svam ālayam //

body.p: atha sā tair bodhisattvavaco'dbhir ākleditahṛdayā duḥkhadaurmanasyaparyākulamānasā niśīthe kāśikārājam upetya karuṇākulatarākṣareṇa vacasā kṛtāñjalir avocat //

lg.l: āpadgatānāṃ vyasanakṣayāya tvaṃ pañcamaḥ pārthiva lokapālaḥ /
trāyasva mām āpadi vartamānāṃ dīnām anāthāṃ jagadekanātha //

body.p: atha sa rājā tad atibhāsuraṃ vapur avalokya kim idaṃ kathaṃ cety utpannajātasaṃbhramaḥ sādaram utthāya paryaṅkapṛṣṭhāt tāṃ nāgayoṣitam etad avocat //

lg.l: dhyāmīkṛtya maṇipradīpakiraṇān etad vapus te sthitaṃ
kā nu tvaṃ karavāṇi kiṃ bhavati te brūhi tvadājñām imāṃ
mālāṃ phulladalām ivādya śirasā samyak pratīcchāmy aham //

body.p: athāsau bhujagavadhūs tena tasya rājño 'bhijātyapeśalena vacasā samānanditamanasā provāca //

lg.l: āśāvaśānāṃ naradeva ko 'nyo manorathaṃ pūrayituṃ samarthaḥ /
tyaktvā bhavantaṃ jagato hitāya prajāpater vaṃśam ivāvatīrṇam //
āpadgataṃ mānada pannagendraṃ trāyasva kṛtyaṃ mama tad garīyaḥ //

body.p: rājovāca // bhagini kas tavāsau bhujagavaraḥ // sā provāca //

lg.l: bhartā mama prāṇadhaneśvaro 'sau nyāyopradeṣṭā ca gurur garīyān /
piteva nityaṃ hitasaṃvidhātāsukhe ca viśrambhaniratyayaś ca //

body.p: atha sa bhūpatis tena tasyāḥ svāmyanurāgaśībhareṇa caritenābhiprasāditaḥ // provāca cainām //

lg.l: bhaktir bhartari darśitā ghanarasā dākṣiṇyam unmīlitaṃ
loke sādhupativratatvam iti te khyātiḥ sthitā śāśvatī //
tyaktvā priyaṃ jīvitam apy ato 'haṃ puṇyaprabhāvopanataṃ ca rājyam /
saṃpūrayiṣyāmi manorathaṃ te paśyādya bhadre dayitaṃ vimuktam //

body.p: atha sa rājā tasya brāhmaṇasyāntikāt taṃ nāgarājānaṃ mahatā mūlyena niṣkrīya parameṇa .............. sapatnīkaṃ svabhavanaṃ praveśya mahārhasiṃhāsanopaviṣṭam abhyarcayām āsa // atha bodhisattvas tena tasya rājño 'tyadbhutena niṣkāraṇopakārasaṃbhrameṇākṛṣṭamanāḥ provācainam //

lg.l: asaṃstute nāma tavāyam ādaro mayi prasādasthirabhaktipeśalaḥ /
kṛtopakāreṣv api yo na dṛśyate pṛthagjaneṣu sukhānubuddhiṣu //
guṇe vivardhasva tad uttarottarair guṇeṣu bhadraṃ jagatāṃ avasthitam //
iti saṃrādhya rājānaṃ tam asau bhujageśvaraḥ /

body.p: iti śrīnāgajātakaṃ catvāriṃśattamam // ḥ //
Puṇyarāśi = GoPr
